We ran into one issue at the beginning where the original arrangement we made was not honoured but it was rectified.Breakfast was the best we've had on our whole trip through Italy- with fresh squeezed juice, cut fruit, croissants and hot dishes. You could even make your own pancakes.Wifi was very strong. Asian themed decor was elegant and beautiful. Finally the hotel recommends a restaurant called L'immogine (not sure of spelling) which is a 5 min walk away. It is amazing -you have to try it!
hotelName:
14    Milan Suite Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Chose this property due to its proximity with my office in Milan. Extremely courteous staff and a special mention to Irina who seems to excel herself every time I needed some help - was also upgraded to their funky suite that has cool water jets in their bathrooms... also must mention their housekeeping rates 10/10. Only downside is the mundane breakfast everyday which could do with some variety..All in all I'd definitely recommend this property very highly
hotelName:
14    Milan Suite Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for nearly two weeks so wanted somewhere more spacious than you can find at such a reasonable price closer to the main attractions. Milan Suite certainly delivered on space and service. Several public transport options are within an easy walk as are a couple of good restaurants, notably L'Imaginne Bistrot and Due Fratelli. We would recommend this hotel as long as the time spent commuting to the city is not as issue for you. It's at least 25 - 30 minutes each way by taxi or bus.
hotelName:
14    Milan Suite Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Atlantic Hotel Milan. Gosh, where do I start. So I had reserved 2 Junior Suits, with the assumption that each room by default can already accommodate 2 people, so I should be able to have 4 people stay in that room per normal hotel policies. But because of an error on the booking page, I had only selected 3 adults. The reality was that we were 5 adults plus 1 baby. So we assumed just needed to pay the extra adult, because the rooms should have 4 people, and baby’s are always free.But upon check-in, the staff named Yuriy gave the worst customer service ever. We had explained about the booking error, and he was rude and tried to forced us to pay for 3 extra people (he counted the baby as an adult). After arguing back and forth, we had to pay for 2 extra adults (despite the junior suite being able to accommodate 4 adults), and the baby he claimed he would “waive”. What a crap hotel and what crap service. Never have I been more insulted in my life.The room itself is old, seems like things in the bathroom were falling apart. Location was good. Breakfast was good. But overall would not recommend this hotel to anyone. I usually don’t post reviews, but because of such crap experience I am posting one. I’ll write this review in Indonesian so another 300 million people can read it and avoid this hotel.Hotel ini bener-bener sampah guys. Jangan ada orang Indo yang mau booking di sini. Seperti yang gw jelasin di atas, gw dah booking 2 kamar, harusnya dapet 4 orang dong. Tapi karena error di booking dan Cuma tulis 3 orang, yang namanya Yuriy marah dan maksa gw bayar 3 ekstra. Kenapa situ marah-marah? Akhirnya setelah bolak balik, gw bayar 2 ekstra. Tapi sejujurnya gw ga terima. Biarpun lokasi dan sarapan okeh, menurut gw kalo percaya dengan sesama orang Indo mendingan hotel sampah ini di hindarin guys di Milan.

review_body: We only used the hotel as a day hotel before going to the airport. The roo was small but well equipped and modern. Staff was friendly and professional. We can recommend the hotel. 2 min walk to central station.

Also, few blocks away, there is a supermarket.

review_body: Highly recommended. Great service and location. Room is good size. Good value for money. Close to transport and all places of intetest. Close to central station, walk distance. Can use train from and to international Airport.

review_body: The location of the hotel is excellent. Two minutes walk from Central Train Station. One minute walk to Metro. Bus shuttle from Linate Airport is €5 and 20 minutes. We had a family room with nice working air condition. Breakfast was good with meat, egg, bread and pastry. One star off for the WiFi. We could never get on the internet.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked two rooms for five people from May 30-June 2, 2019. The hotel is closer to Linate Airport than Malpensa - no surprise there. The sticker in the taxi advised that the trip would cost €50 euros but actually cost €18. It's a 5-minute walk from the central train station.Our room was modern and comfortable. We had a king bed, closets, TV, desk, safe, and windows overlooking an interior court shared by the other buildings on the block. Our bathroom was very modern, with a large vanity, sink, hair-dryer, loo, bidet, tub with a half-door (why do they do that???) and shower. Unlike most hotels we've encountered in Europe, there was no slot to turn on the power with your key-card.The elevator is microscopic - no surprise there. Three empty-handed people, max. (For newbies, all over the rest of the world, the level you walk into from the street is 0 or the ground floor, and the 1st floor is what we'd call the 2nd floor, and so on. So if you're pushing elevator buttons and nothing's happening, remember that. Your 3rd-floor room is on what would be the 4th floor in the U.S.) Breakfast is included, as usual, and is served in the breakfast room on the ground floor. It's the usual generous spread you'll find all over Europe and Asia - various breads, spreads for bread, fresh fruit, hard-boiled eggs, pastries, occasionally cookies, cereals hot and cold, add-ins for cereals, yogurt, cheeses, deli meat. All fresh and attractively displayed. Coffee, tea, juice, milk. All is included except specialty coffees like cappuccino, for which there is a small extra charge.I'm a technoboob so couldn't get WiFi to work in our room. I took my phone to the front desk and they helped me with it. Friendly, helpful, and multi-lingual.All in all, this is a well-located, comfortable, modern hotel.Via Napo Torriani is lined on both sides with similar hotels, as well as trats and restaurants. The subway station is a 1-minute walk. The Central train station takes maybe 5 minutes with luggage. Milan is a business city, so while it's pleasant and leafy, you won't find historical glories around every corner. The Hotel Atlantic is two blocks from a large business center with banks and ATMs, and a few subway stops from the Duomo and Gallerie Vittorio Emmanuel with all the fashion shops.I checked the budget box. We paid about $850 for five people in two rooms for three nights, which seems reasonable. You can probably spend a lot more, and you could also find a hostel for less.Note about the price: We booked in March or April for our May 30-June 2 stay, and needed one more night, June 13, before flying home. Between June 2 and 13, the tourist season must have changed, because the same rooms were quoted as twice as much for June 13. So we didn't stay there.
hotelName:

review_body: I have visited Milano first time. I was satisfied .I will recommend the hotel to my friends. The location, the stuff, the room, the clenliness was perfect. If l travel do Milano, l will visit this hotel.

review_body: Hotel facilities were acceptable but WiFi did not work for most of visit. When we enquired the front desk staff was rude and condescending. They seemed bothered by any question or request.I travel frequently and have NEVER seen this type of behavior at a hotel in over 30 years.

review_body: My wife and me stayed in C Alantuc Hotel for 2 nights. The front staff are very professional including the chambermaid. The room is clean and comfortable. Convenient location to access Milano train station.

review_body: Had some difficulty finding the location on my GPS but eventually found it after 20mins. The building is located behind another hotel that's right across the Milan Central Station so you may face some confusion if it's your first time thereNote that upon entering the hotel, you will need to descend some stairs so if you need help with your luggage, let the staff know! Check in was relatively easy and the staff are informative and friendly.We were lucky to get the top floor and even though our room was a little small (we booked an Economy Double Room), we still had just enough space to work around it. Do also note that the hair dryer in the bathroom cannot be switched on for too long and it will just stop working when it gets to a certain temperature, so ladies with long hair, do take note.Another thing is that the lift is quite small so sometimes it can get a little uncomfortable if you have other guests who insist on taking the lift with you (there's not much room for personal space!)Other than that, the hotel is overall okay.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic

review_body: Its a nice and always clean hotel. The quality of the rooms is excellent. The bed was comfort and the cleaning of the room spotless. The staff is always available to help you and to give helpful advise about the city. The hotel is nearby the central train station, which is amazing.

review_body: Hotel was conveniently located 5 minutes walk away from Central Station. Rooms were big and comfortable. Staff were also friendly. Breakfast buffet spread had decent variety and food quality was also good. Will recommend!

review_body: very nice hotel clean and quiet. importantly very close to 'stazione centrale' and to the bus for malpensa...overall a nice hotel. also the breakfast had a right balance between sweet and salty choices.

review_body: We stayed 4 nights here and didn't encountered significant issues. Room is clean and comfortable. Not much noise either even though our window faces the street. Hot shower is quick and sufficient.Upon check in and out, you will need to walk down and up a short flight of stairs to reception. Hotel has a porter standby to help you for this. The room doesn't have a lock on the inside, which makes us rather uncomfortable. Some free toiletries are also available for the business travellers.There are plenty of restaurants and supermarkets around the hotel. Just bear in mind the supermarkets mostly closes around 8-9pm.The hotel is very close to central railway station and Centrale FS Metro station so its very convenient to get around. Just remember to avoid the morning and evening rush hours.

review_body: Nice property at the city center. Friendly and professional staff. Hotel is just a 2min walk for the central station and 1hr by bus from Malpensa international airport but you have airport buses from the station for every 20min.

review_body: Clean & cozy room, good location as near to train station, friendly and attentive staff. Check in done in less than 5 minutes. Overall quite satisfied with the all facilities and it's value for money.

Asked for another room for my last two nights, and was moved to a room in the other wing the 5th floor, which was fine.

review_body: We were delighted by the customer service. Management and staff were very attentive. It was my wife birthday and we were surprised with a bottle of Prosecco. Such a sweet detail. Our stay was great and would choose this location again!! Thank You!!

review_body: We needed a place close to train station and close to the shuttle to the airport. This worked great! Furnishings and everything are better than expected. Beds and Pillows great! It looked like our room had been nicely renovated recently. The staff was nice. There is half flight of stairs to the reception area from the front door, but a worked grabbed our bags and brought them down for us.

review_body: Its a very good place either for business or for vacation. Short distance from the Central station and 20 min walk from Duomo. Very clean, comfortable beds, quiet area, natural light, fresh air, appropriate temperature, nice bath. Everything someone needs for a nice restful sleep.

review_body: Everything was great! Good breakfast. Comfortable bed, soft pillow. Good service in the restaurant. Very good location. The room is clean and nice and comfortable. Coffee and tea at the reception free of charge.

review_body: I am a very frequent traveler to Milan . I must say this is one of the best hotels near Stazione Centrale where I have ever stayed. It's very clean and comfortable, it offers excellent fresh breakfast and it has a great quality/price ratio. My only criticism is the size of the room: too small.

review_body: Nice hotel close to central station Big and clean room for family,Polite and helpful staffBreakfast was good and enough.You can refresh in the lobby with tea or coffee for free that nice after a day exploring the city

review_body: The concierge were amazing and very helpful, the hotel was very clean and the whole stuf is welcoming at breakfast at the desk hotel whatever you needed there was always someone there to answer your question or your need.

review_body: This hotel is just a couple blocks from cental station. Great option if you are taking a train, or arriving from the airport. Also if you are renting a car. The rooms are spacious and quiet. Great breakfast.

15    c-hotels Atlantic

review_body: Warm staff ready for the extra effort (I was limping and they came to help with the luggage without me having to ask), tidy room of the right size, good wi-fi, and good coffee and cappuccino at breakfast with good choice of healthy and less healthy foodYou don't need more.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have just returned from 3 days in Milan and stayed at this hotel. If like us, you are looking for a well located bolt hole then this hotel is ideal. It is located within a 10 minute walk of central station, making it really easy to get to from the airport. A shuttle was €14 return, bought at Malpensa airport. You can see the metro station entrance from the hotel entrance, which is excellent for getting around Milan( it’s too big to walk everywhere). €4.50/€8 for 24/48 hour travel card for the metro(bought from the metro station). The staff at the hotel were friendly, helpful and spoke good English. The hotel will store luggage for you if you arrive too early for check in or after you check out so you can continue exploring before you need to fly home. The rooms are small but we found this consistent with other expensive cities such as London or New York where space is a premium. The rooms are well appointed and nicely decorated however are a little noisy and could do with more sound proofing but, like us, if you are getting back late and leaving early to enjoy maximum exploring then it’s not too much of an issue. We didn’t eat breakfast at the hotel as there are many places In Milan you can get breakfast. All in all this is a good ideal for the price. My top tips for visiting Milan would be to visit Navigli canal(Porta Genova metro station I think). It has a fab atmosphere and plenty of bars and restaurants. This was our favourite place in Milan. Also the QC Terme thermal spa if you have time and like that sort of thing. It was fab and we spent nearly all day there. Happy travelling. X
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I am very thankful to the Hotel staff who received us very well. In fact I had a booking for other hotel nearby but it had been cancelled. I explained my anxiety in the reception; I paid for the four nights and everything was solved.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: great breakfast and nice staff. In general, it was a satisfying stay for business trip. Clean sheet and facilities. Great location to go anywhere; jut next to Central station. Though the sound proof system is better if it can be improved but already great for the price. thanks for the great services.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose this hotel because it is a 4-star. However it was a disappointing stay - only worth for 3*. We travelled with a 8-month old baby so we sent email to the hotel to request a baby cot before the trip. We have received no response. No baby cot was provided on our arrival. Fortunately we brought a foldable travel cot with us. The special offer on free room upgrade in TripAdvisor is fake. We followed the instructions to send a request to the hotel but received no response too. Of course no upgrade for our stay. Don’t book this hotel if travel with baby buggy or wheelchair. There are stairs only to access to the hotel: from street to lobby, from lobby to the breakfast area, from lobby to the disabled washroom. It’s so inconvenience. Room was clean and comfortable. Only foam cups and plastic cups were provided in the room. Towels looked old. We will not come back again.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel, rooms were bigger, and more luxurious than expected. Great value and lovely staff, always happy to help and the language barrier was no issue.Would recommend, will be visiting again, thanks
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean hotel with service minded personnel and convenient location. Very very clean- and it was our main requirement. Our economy room was quite small but enough for two people to sleep in. Comfortable beds, quite despite it is located 5 min from the central station. As central station is very close it is very convenient to make some day trips or take or from the airport. Breakfast was really good, probably not externally much variation but enough and tasted good. We really enjoyed our stay.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My large family needed to stay near the central train station. I was happy to find such a nice property around the corner. It was easy to get to the main attractions and restaurants. The staff was very helpful and our rooms were lovely. I would highly recommend!!
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: we were 7 adults and 7 kids who stayed here from the 23rd of December for 2 nights...after an initial hiccup at the Check in which took a little while longer than we expected , we had a pleasant stay ...hotel was centrally located the rooms were spacious and clean ....the breakfast was really good it was basic but quality ...the coffee service was really useful .....staff was friendly and helpful...definitely will repeat our stay .....and most importantly the hotel was kid friendly .......
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An interesting experience staying in the Atlantic hotel. This is the second time I have stayed there with my family to take a vacation. The location only few steps from train station. There is a bus from the airport, no need to use taxi. The breakfast is very simple but nutritious, the chef is very helpful in choosing and making halal food. I highly recommend this hotel for visitors who are fussy in choosing food.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a great and comfortable stay. The hotel is just walking distance from Milan Central Station. The room was very clean and breakfast had good varieties. The staff was very welcoming at all times.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel with welcoming and polite staff. It is just a five minutes walk from Centrale Fs Station. The room was big, clean and well-equipped, and having CNN was a bonus. There was complimentary coffee, tea and hot water in the lobby 24/7.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Amazing hotel. Affordable and very nice staff. I will recommend it to everyone.I stayed here for one night and would highly recommend this hotel. It's close to the Milano centrale . Plenty of restaurants and nightlife close by. There's a grocery store a block down and help me with information about the metros and buses. The Concierge was excellent. He recommended a restaurant to eat at and gave us a map on how to get there. I will definitely be coming back to stay at this hotel in the future.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic

review_body: Just home from a 4 night stay here. The hotel was in a fantastic location 5 minutes walk to central station. Easy for travelling to other parts. Staff were very helpful, room was a good size and clean. Plenty of choices at breakfast and all fresh. Great stay and would return.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in Atlantic just for one night - i got upgraded to a nicer room which was spacious and clean. Staff was very friendly and the location next to Milano Centrale is very convenient if you are travelling by train.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our flight had been changed due to bad weather so we arrived in Milan a day early. My hotel was completely booked so I found this hotel. I really loved it and wished I had booked my entire stay here. We were given a newly renovated room with the only balcony. It was really nice! We loved it. We dealt with Vanessa and she was wonderful. She was so nice and made sure our every need was met. I would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very friendly staff, very good braakfast, very clean room. Everywhere in the hotel good atmosphere. Perfect for travels by underground and trains. Perfect also for a discovery stay of Milano. I would warmly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located very near to the central train station, this hotel is very easy to get into and out of. It is very clean and roomy by European standards. The only drawback is that it takes about 25 minutes to walk to the cathedral and shopping districts.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have a great time at c-hotels Atlantic, it is just 5mins walk away from Milano Centrale station which is very convenient if you're dragging heavy luggage, the room is very clean and decent in size compared to other rooms in Italia, it maybe far if you walk to the tourist spots but taking the metro is quite a breeze in getting to the center. Being near to the train station made our daily trip to Lake Como and St. Moritz, Switzerland very easy. Yes you read that right, Switzerland, You can make a day tour by taking the Bernina Express train going to St. Moritz via Tirano, it is the highest railway to the alps, may i also remind you, the views are breathtaking. The breakfast is good made even better by the friendly filipino staffs. Big plus, it also has an asian grocery store right across the street.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pretty pretty small room. Comfy bed. TV. Large windows. Solid Wi-Fi. I think there was AC. Location is super convenient, being 1 block away from the main train station. Also walking distance to the middle of town (15-20 minutes to Duomo di Milano). Friendly staff that all spoke English. Breakfast was very good. This review is barely readable.
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very enjoyable stay in this hotel located minutes from the train station. The staff were attentive and friendly and the bed was comfortable . The breakfast buffet had lots to choose from ..probably the first time I have seen potato and leek soup on the menu ☺would definitely go back to this hotel. The only thing worth noting is the wooden floors in the rooms meant you could hear the cleaners in rooms above if you stayed in bed a bit late in the morning .
hotelName:
15    c-hotels Atlantic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in an ideal location everything is either a short taxi ride, walk or metro. The hotel is clean with modern decor, the rooms are comfortable, very clean and quiet. The staff cannot help you enough and so friendly.. This was my first time in Italy and I was made to feel so welcome. My only very minor criticism is the breakfast menu was limited.. but the quality of food very good.. I would recommend this hotel if you are planning a short city break in Milan.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here 3 nights. Room was really lovely with a nice view looking over street and was very spacious with a small dressing room and lovely bathroom. No bath. Fridge which isn't always in all hotels. This is a modern hotel and everything is fresh and new looking. Flat location which made accessing with luggage easier on the cobblestone pathways.Breakfast included and was good with hot and cold foods, coffees to order and nice staff. This hotel is used by Tour Companies so breakfast can sometimes get very busy and I did encounter some rude people but that isn't the hotels fault. The location is right across the road from Central Station. This is a major railway station with trains to all over Italy and beyond as well as the Metro Station. It is an easy walk with or without luggage from the hotel. There are Taxi's at the station which I also used a couple of times. There are several restaurants and shops within the Station. Several restaurants are located near the hotel although as was travelling alone, was advised not to be out walking alone late at night. The restaurants were close but I did make sure I was back in before too late. There are a few beggars and people selling things who approach you but didn't encounter any problems and just a shake of head saying No usually had them moving on. Hop On Hop Off Bus and Bus Tours leave from opposite side of Station.I would certainly recommend staying here if using Rail Transport as the location is ideal however apart from a few restaurants, the area doesn't have many shops and can be a bit isolated. The Hotel however is fabulous.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice 4 star hotel located 2 minutes from the Centrale train station, which makes it very convenient because of the transportation options and it’s a safe area. The hotel has a nice & warm design- interior & exterior. The room was equipped with all the necessary things. It is a bit small for 2 people & so is the bath room. Breakfast was ok and offered quite satisfying selection. It was my first night at this hotel (usually i stay at another hotel in milan regularly) and it was ok for one night- good money value. The only thing that bothered me was the shading curtains- was not wide enough and in the morning, the light got in to the room. As being sensitive to day light that was annoying. Thanks for the hospitality
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.

review_body: If you are looking for a decent hotel near the train station, this is a good choice The room is very clean and spacious and it looks surprisingly new2 minutes walk to the train station with very affordable priceThe breakfast buffet is pretty decent
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.

review_body: I was the last week in May and the hotel it's good and what you could expect in a 4 stars hotel. I consider that the gym could be bigger, but for sure they compensate that a bit with a nice view. The location also is good, is close to the central station, BUT that's also the biggest issue, you can feel when the underground pass below the hotel, you can feel a small vibration that could be for some people a concern if you have a light sleep.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.

review_body: Stayed on a higher floor so I cannot comment on the noise levels of the train for the lower floored rooms but we did not hear anything at all on the 6th floor (and I am a very light sleeper). Room was excellent, very clean and modern. Breakfast was great, no complaints. Location of the hotel is perfect.

review_body: Stayed here in Milan for two nights in the Superior rooms which were well furnished.Was happy with the decor.The service was courteous.They have a wide spread for breakfast. This hotel is situated almost opposite and close to the Milano Centrale railway station.It was an enjoyable stay.Dr.Javed Rasheed

review_body: Wonderful hotel!As soon as we arrived Silvia at the frontdesk gave us a very nive room with a big smile and very very kind!Excelent location closed by train station!Congratulations Star hotels echo to have a very nice staff as Silvia and Douglas at the reception!
hotelName:

review_body: We spent our last two nights in Italy here at the Starhotels Echo and it was great! The location was perfect for us. It is right across from the train station so very convenient if you’re traveling by train. We could walk anywhere in the city but the Metro is just right there. Plenty of markets and restaurants within walking distance. The room was nice and big as was the bathroom. The bed was comfortable. We even had a balcony. The staff were very friendly and helpful. My only comment is that if you’re staying in a room on the first floor, you can hear the subway trains running constantly under you. I sleep with a sound machine so it wasn’t a problem, just something to make note of. Other than that, we loved this hotel and would definitely stay there again!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in this hotel just one night and I must say i’m in love with starhotels. Greate staff (fast check in and out), greate location( just a few steps from central station and metro) greate breakfast and fab room. I will come back
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Convenient location almost on the steps of the Central train station. Rooms could be a little bit bigger, but you do not fill worked about this. Modern design, excellent service, all clean, very friendly staff.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good hotel,exellent room,great location. Stuff are very polite and nice. Breakfirst little bit poor but ok. There is coffee and tea in room and kettle. Wi fi works very good. Pillow little bit to soft.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.

review_body: Great location, five minutes walk from Centrale. Good sized modern rooms, friendly and helpful team. Only drawbacks are that its over the metro line so may be aware of this if on lower floors (we were on 4th and the trains didn't bother us), and glass bathroom door with mirror opposite provides no privacy! Would recommend
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What’s not to love? A 4* + hotel without a shadow of a doubt. The little things really matter to the guys in this hotel. Lovely breakfast. We had an upgraded room with a balcony which was just perfection. Gorgeous interiors. Would definitely recommend!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Handy location, just across the Milano Centrale, where the train stops and also is the bus location from/to the Airport (Bergamo). Clean, comfortable beds, and quiet room, with complimentary tea and coffee provided. Breakfast was not part of our booking but you could have continental breakfast buffet in the hotel at a reasonable price.My only regret was not able to take photographs of the accommodation.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very very conveniently situated across the road from Milano Central railway station. Not difficult to cart ones luggage across to hotel from station. Staff very friendly, from porter to receptionist. Allowed us an early check-in. Said we were upgraded, but can’t confirm that as I’m not exactly sure what was to be expected. Very comfortable, modern, clean room. Lovely large bathroom. Breakfast very good too. We spent one night there before flying out of Malpensa.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located just 4-5mins walk across the Milano Centrale station and 4 stops away by metro from Duomo. It is convenient that we don’t have to transfer trains after a long journey from Switzerland and going to airport directly from this station too. We booked a family room, it comes with 2 connecting rooms, the rooms are at the end of the corridor with an additional door to close up. Modern deco and we had the best sleep here throughout our Europe trip. Breakfast is awesome and included in the room rates. Loved the variety and mixed nuts to go with yogurt. The chocolate croissant & cakes is a must try.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We selected this hotel after checking out a number of properties. It was convenient to the train station and we would be taking several day train trips. We found the hotel to meet or exceed our expectations. It was sparkling, the staff helpful, rooms modern and clean. Nice linens. Breakfast was excellent with a wide selection. Highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s the best hotel I have stay in Italy . Very nice decoration & good buffet breakfast. And I sleep well on the soft bed with cool AC. Not easy to find good Working AC in Europe . 100% recommended and definitely come back again. Can see Milan central station from my room!!!!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We originally booked in the Starhotels Anderson, but when we arrived we found out that they had fouled up our reservation. However, they offered us a suite at the E.c.ho across the street for our trouble. The hotel is quite modern and seemed relatively new. No complaints about the suite at all, but I can't really comment on the normal rooms. Location is great if you will be using the trains, but areas around train stations can be a little dodgy at night, so plan accordingly. Convenient to subway into central Milan as well.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I went to Milan with a friends for a 3 day shopping trip. I booked usin this hotel due to its close access to the airport bus service to Bergamo as our flight out was early in the morning. I've live in Milan for 3 years so I know the city and I had checked the hotel for a group of friends back when it was renovated.This is a lovely hotel with friendly professional staff who are extremely helpful. The room was super nice, lines were great. We had no problem with the noise. Breakfast was nice with a decent variety. We forgot to bring toothpaste and got a toothbrush - toothpaste package at the reception. A good hotel to get to the airport on the bus or go around Milan using public transportation. The one thing I would change ASAP was the bathtub in the bathroom. I would prefer a shower.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was in town with some other friends as well, for the F1 Monza race, and booked us all in this hotel due to its close access to the train station.I must say, what a pleasant surprise and so cute inside. We had a great visit, hung out in the bar area each evening of our 4 nights and loved the service received there. We also got great recommendations and assistance by the front desk crew both morning & evenings.Rooms were spacious enough and the breakfast plentiful. And, of course, can’t beat the location to Centrale. Thanks Starhotels!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very stylish and the space is decent. The Milano Central station is across the road and good commute to the city centre. The best was okay, not a lot varieties. The room was very clean and very comfortable to sleep. Don't have a great view though but it was okay because we were expecting it.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a lovely hotel with friendly professional staff who are extremely helpful. The room is luxurious and the foyer comfortable and inviting.A good hotel to get to the airport on the bus or if you’re travelling around Italy from Milan an excellent base.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is next to the central railway station.We booked a suite for 350 euros per night and expected high service. It was on the 3rd floor but we still could hear underground trains.The water in the shower was brown when you switched it on. Just after 5 min running it became transparent. It happened every day.The worst part was with my money:I had a prepaid accommodation, so everything was fine until I asked to extend my booking for a few more days. I was told that I would be charged on my check out day.Here my nightmare has started: every night I saw "pre-authorisations" charged on my card. Hotel staff couldn't help me as their system did that automatically and they even didn't see all of the charges. By check out moment I was overcharged for 900 euros more than I had to pay. At check out I was assured that over charge would be returned in a few days cause it was just pre-authorisation and that my card was removed from the system.A few days after check out I got another charge for 1900 euros from this hotel. So total overcharged amount was 2800 euros! I called to the hotel but they didn't see these charges in their system.I had to deal with my bank and I got a refund by the end of the month, in about 3 weeks! I also need to notice that with all this pre-authorisation and refund process I lost about 100 euro just on currency exchange rate.Worst customer experience! Scammers!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Picked this hotel for its proximity to Milano Centrale. We literally walked out the side exit/entrance and saw the hotel across the street. We had three rolling bags and could walk straight there! Only off thing was that the bathroom door was broken and didn't close. Other than that, great room and price.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel felt almost brand new - very modern and clean. Wifi was fast so good for business.Downstairs in the lobby they have a nice cafe area and a restaurant.Location seemed good - I don;t know Milan well but went for a nice walk around some local squares, felt very safe.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Best hotel in Italy i have stayed. I spent 3 nights in this hotel and never regretted my choice totally. Near to the Centrale FS station, and the room was so clean and new, i like the interior design and everything in my room. It looks so trendy and comfortable to stay.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was very clean, service was good as normal business hotel, location was excellent, breakfast selection was pretty nice in European countries. Airport bus was just located at the opposite side of the train station, which just cost you 8 Euro per person, you dont need to purchase in advance, the bus service are frequent. The only cons of the hotel was assigned to a first floor room, the rumbling sound of the trains were quite annoying. This rumbling sound will happen in every 10~15 mins until the train service was finished of the day. We just stay in Milan for one night, so we didnt request to change the room.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We recently had a 1 night stay in Milan on our way up to Lake Como and chose Star Hotels Echo. My girlfriend and I were tired from travelling and received a lovely warm welcome from staff at reception, despite it being late. We were lucky to be upgraded to a suite with a terrace which was amazing and the room was spacious and very tastefully decorated. The breakfast was good with lots of choice and throughout the staff were incredibly helpful and friendly.The hotel is right next to Milano Centrale station and so really convenient.Top marks all round.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of the hotel doesn’t get any better than this as it’s literally a three-minute walk across from the Milano Centrale station. Rooms are spacious for European standard and the hotel breakfast is surprisingly good with plenty of fresh, healthy food options. The restaurant also does an a la carte menu in partnership with Eataly, which offers reassurance on quality. Would definitely stay here again and recommend this hotel to others.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed one night in the hotel. It is very central and just some steps from the central station. The hotel is very modern.The check-in was friendly and fast. We got a deluxe room with a shower. The room was new but not very big. There was not a lot of space for two suitcases.We enjoyed a wonderful breakfast with a very big buffet for Italy.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Dear allI have come here quite a few times and being central is good, there is the station at front, taxi depot but beware...... at breakfast it is better if you arrive as soon as they open because it is a sort of stampeed of who gets what. You have to shout for a coffee otherwise it is better to go outside at a bar for service. The buffet is super modern but better to look at than taste. Returning late from work unfortunately you use room service and every time i ask for the most simplest thing i get a call back saying the menu has changed! The rooms are clean but the maid always forgets to do certain things, the linen is recycled. By the way its ok to come here on a holiday!!! That the kind of service you except!!!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were only there for a day but wish we stayed longer, as Milan seemed to have more to offer than we originally thought. Easy to get to from the train station, especially when you have luggage. Not close to the city center, though. Nice rooms and good service.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely Modern hotel with super friendly staff.Bedroom was a decent size & Shower was amazing. Decor is ultra slick & modern, totally to our taste. Everything was spotlessly clean. Breakfast had all you could want including Vegetables and salad which was ideal for me being Vegetarian. Location is excellent for Metro and Train as opposite Milan central. Duomo station to city is only about 4 stops. We also caught fast Train to Verona & Venice very easily booked.A few Bars and restaurants within walking distance but easier to just pop into town for €1.50 on metro. Sightseeing Tour hop on & off bus across the road and also €5 to Linate Airport bus outside Milano central station. Didn't spend much time in the hotel but it's a perfect base to tour Milan.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Star hotels are clean no nonsense places to stay and this place is no different. Right at the back of Central Station Milan, it does it job. However the staff at reception needs some pleasantness towards patrons which is clearly missing.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed two nights in this hotel before a trip towards Switzerland.Previously stayed in the same hotel around 5 years ago. Still the same clean hotel. Extremely convenient and right next to Central Station.They have a promotion where you can upgrade to a better room. For ~ 100 odd Euros more can upgrade to the suite. Huge room with separate bedroom and lounge as well as a balcony.Overall a nice comfortable stay.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here during my visit to Milan on March 2018. The hotel located just opposite the train station. Easy access even with big luggage. We reach the hotel very early in the morning due to our flight schedule, we are unable to check in at that time we we can drop our luggage. Hotel staffs are friendly, room was clean. However, we think the bed can be improved Too soft for our liking and we think that two single bed combined to become a king size bed is not so comfortable to sleep in. Hotel breakfast was good, good selections and delicious. Overall, this hotel is good and will stay here again for my next visit.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my wife who works with me went to Milan for business visit I had chosen this hotel as I had stayed their for one night on my previous trip. Hotel is located near to Milan Central Station which was major advantage for us. Staff of the hotel is very courteous and friendly. Rooms were little small but properly decorated so it didn't effect us much. Rooms were very clean, wash room wash very clean too. Breakfast was very good. Being vegetarian we prefer Indian food there are a couple of Indian restaurants walking distance to the hotel. Hotel was very accommodative we asked for checkout at 1 PM against regular time of 12 Noon we were granted that without hassle.I would highly recommend this hotel if you want to stay close to Indian restaurant options as well as Milan Central Station.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent and clean hotel. Great location. These perfect people upgraded us for free and made us so happy.We will never forget the experience. One of the best hotels we have ever been. Very good breakfast!Many thanks again
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, front desk and bar staff very friendly and helpful, laundry service very efficient , BUT, rooms very small, had the"deluxe" room , ok I suggest for one night only because you can walk from the station , but I was here for three and it's very small, came from spending a night in Geneva , paid same money got more value in Switzerland :??? That is very unusual , The rooms air conditioning seems to be controlled by reception , ?? the in room controller seems to have no effect, the room was far too hot, opening window was too noisy , I asked for assistance 5 times , had various attempts, even had a visit from staff member . They offered to move rooms but that was late one night, not practical I was in bed !! The offer was genuine but no practicality . They claimed a technician came one day but no change in my opinion. If you want a noisy air conditioner fan running all night just to have warm breeze (light sleepers beware) to blow hot air around , this is the place for you , I am here in January , !!!! summer in my opinion will be a nightmare , very genuine staff but no sign of management or ownership of the issues, no follow up I will not be back.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I really liked this hotel! I went on a business trip for a couple of days and I think it has all the necessary for everyone's stay. The room was quite big, and mine even had a balcony prepared in case of smokers (I'm not, but it's a detail that the room doesn't smell bad). I didn't have the breakfast included, but I had it and it was very nice also, a lot of variety!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I really enjoyed my stay is Starhotels E.c.h.o first the staff is very professional and friendly. Location just in front of the main Rail Station very convenient if you plan in traveling around Italy or Europe. Rooms are small but very nice decorated and had everything we needed. Breakfast at the hotel was delicious but there is other places to eat if you decide not to eat at the hotel. I would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel next the the Milano Centrale train and tube station. the rooms are very pretty with a green touch. the hotel was built to be eco friendly as the name say. Bar also very nice, I discovered a nice italian bitter alcohol called P31. A must with some prosecco (p31 spritz)
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We really enjoyed our stay here. We had very cosy room with comfortable bed. Location next to the central station is additional advantage. Our breakfast was also very decent. A small minus for lack of swimming pool and mini bar (partly not in the fridge, which suggested some products are for free).
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was was good. But:At the time of the checkout I was asked to pay more that was stated in my voucher. Hotel manager Guacomo was very disrespectful. He told me that he is going to charge my credit card extra money.My voucher had detailed explanation of the charges and fees . The manager kept on saying that is a mistake on Agoda's site . ( manager wanted to charge extra 30euros , what a shame! )After arguing with mefor 30 min he told that he have changed his mind and not going to charge my credit card without my authorization. (Thanks god!) He suggest to call Agoda and ask to change the tax fees . I find it ridicules behavior of the hotel management. The disrespect of the hotel guests and condescending attitude Will turn hotel guests away! Very disappointed .
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very clean hotel but that's about it.I was not pleased with the check-in. The receptionist was skeptical whether he should take our IDs and not passports as he was not aware if my country was in the EU or nor which it has been for the past 10 years. It felt like he kept looking down on us and especially when you have seen that he was treating the check-in before us nicer, it makes a big difference. Not very good soundproofing of the rooms as well. Our neighbors kept banging their door at all times during the night. Extremely unpleasant when you are on holiday and trying to relax...The worst part came after we checked-out. I forgot my keys in the room, unfortunately. As I work in a hotel, I am fully aware of the procedures and was willing to pay for the postage myself. However, the hotel informed me that it would cost me 70 euros to send a pair of keys from Italy to UK which took me aback as usually a postage overseas does not cost that much. After a few weeks of trying to arrange a collection unsuccessfully, my boyfriend emailed them in Italian and they told him they can send it for 15 euros... You can imagine how I felt... So because I don't speak Italian and I am not Italian, I have to pay 55 euro more... I will not recommend!!! Very poor service!!! I would rate minus if I can!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located central within 2 min walking distance from Central Station in Milan as well as several subway stations. The hotel offers nice, clean and perfect sized rooms with all necessary items for business trips. The staff is very friendly and the breakfast buffet amazing. Highly recommendable.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is about 5 minutes walk to the main train station. It is in a very convenient location as you can take the subways from the main train station to pretty much anywhere in Milan! The rooms were very clean, well maintained and modern! It was also very roomy with a built in couch. Check in was very quick and staff were always very polite and helpful! Breakfast was included and it was delicious! There was a very good selection.I will definitely stay at this hotel again in my next trip to Milan!
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect hotel for an overnight stay between two train rides. Location directly across the train station.The rooms are modern and work well for those who do not need to be center of town.Nevertheless you can use the metro from the station.A private garage is also great.The service was impeccable and they went out of their way to accommodate us.The food in the Etaly dinning area was disappointing but the breakfast spread was impressive other than the beacon that was like leather (maybe it was beef ?)Good value for money
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After following the directions given on one site to find the hotel 925mins0 we found it just off the square outside the station.A good location, on a relatively quiet side-street.It's a subtle but very attractive building and a lot of thought has gone into the design.The reception is quite sleek and modern and the bedroom corridors dark and chic.Our room was not large but very comfortable and just right for a city break-very cleverly planned with great use of space and high quality fitments.Great beds and linen and a good bathroom with all the expected extras.The restaurant is worth using.We ate there twice and both meals were cooked with care and attention.The Parma Ham is delicious and is generous enough for two to have a good sized portion.On the second evening we had the Risotto Milanese, a must if you go to Milan and it was delicious.The wine list is well chosen and there is also a small choice by the small and medium carafe.I had a superb glass of Amazon in the bar to Finnish off the meal
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We love this hotel and we stayed there for like 4 times already. The room on the photo here - is the exact room we stayed in. The service is outstanding, they. really try to provide you with more than you expect to get at 4 star hotel. The rooms are nice and clean and the food is good. It's not in the center of Milan, but there are lots of transportation services around.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was impressed by the quality of accommodations of this Eco friendly hotel located across from the Milan Central station. The rooms are large and well appointed and the staff is very efficient and friendly. The buffet breakfast that was included in the price of the room was above average.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at the hotel for four nights with my boyfriend. The hotel is very nice with a beautiful design and clean atmosphere. The room was comfortable. The service from the staff at the desk was okay, but nothing out of the ordinary. The breakfast was satisfying. The location is very close to two different metro stations and close to the central station.
hotelName:
16    Starhotels E.c.ho.
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: well, going for a business travel, your expectations are lower, but here are still some things that could be improved.I got bigger room, however you could see that the furniture is old and would needs some renewal or reconstruction. this applies for room and bathroom as well. I had breakfast with some colleagues and there is always some cutlery missing on the table, and when you ask for it, you get strange look from the waiters - like how come it is not on the table. breakfast is also average. Overall it is more like 3* hotel.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in hotel for three nights as i was attending a conference room is good bath room is very nice location is very bad far away from main city but tram station is not very far the only way to commute breakfast is ok staff nice and very helpful
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good value for payed money! Clean, all necessary things are in the room, free parking, good wi-fi and breakfast. To reach Milan you will need to use public transport (tram ~25-30 minutes) as there are a lot of zones traffico limitato in it.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: On the positive, the hotel was great, clean, friendly staff,spacious rooms and good value. However it was a long way from the centre. There is tram 14 which goes from nearby the hotel but the journey is 35 to the Duomo. This is fine but just be aware that the hotel is at the end of the line. We got some good value rooms and were prepared to travel to save money but you lose on convenience. You can’t go back to the hotel and change for the evening as its too far. It depends in your priorities. Also the hotel is right by a petrol station and in a business/ high rise flat kind of suburb. The area has zero Milan charm.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stay only 1 night in this hotel with my wife and 2 daughters. We were stop by in Milan for 1 night on our way to Rome from Zurich. Check in very late around 10.pm after visited Milan city centre. The room was clean and spacious. The bath room was great with bathtub; rarely found during my previous trip in Europe. The breakfast was good but need more varieties.Will recommend this hotel for others.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: very clean hotel with nice design in the rooms. Slight away from the center of city ~40 minutes with tram that is round the corner. The sound insulation within hotel was not so good as you could here everything happening in the corridor. You could also be mistaken that it was your room opened or closed, furthermore the slippers must be requested from the reception !Overall the personnel was very polite and eager to assist. Notice that reception had also tram tickets that was very helpful as the station is near by.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 3 days and the only issue was a slight sewage smell in the room . It was fixable by running the water in the bathroom. This is a not an uncommon problem in multistory buildings. We would stay here again.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good clean hotel. The no 50 bus takes you in to the centre of Milan. Breakfast buffet but good quality. Staff friendly and very clean looks well kept. If ever in Milan again I would stay here would recommend it to my family and friends.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here a couple of times recently on Business. Used to be a Holiday Inn but has been taken over by the Chinese owned IH Hotel Group who own a number of Hotels throughout Italy. Fairly Standard Business Hotel with clean modern rooms, decent breakfast (although green beans alongside the bacon and scrambled egg!). Kettle provided in the room to make tea or coffee.Public Transport nearby to take you into the centre of Milan in about 40 minutes.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean new modern refurbed hotel with a lovely bright breakfast area next to the pool.Friendly helpful staff. Large rooms tram for 1.5 EUR straight to Duomo.Incredible value for money when I visited. Little bit out of town but surprisingly better than the central hotels.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent solution to stay in Milan in the business area. Clean room, very good the breakfast and quite friendly the staff. Parking available inside the hotel. Very good the WiFi service. Necessary car or public transport to reach the city center. nice
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: By price, this hotels can give you better offer than other, similar Milan Hotels, because of the distance from downtown and attraction level around the Hotel. I mean, on foot, not so much to see around the Hotel as it's more like an outskirt office area of the city. There is a tram (Nr. 14) goes to downtown (Duomo) 21 stations, fro the single price of EUR 1.5 (Bigletto urbano - you can by at near kiosk, but not at the station). Hotel was fine, nicely furnitured, even the extra bed (couch) was with one affordable matrace built in. The air condition setting fixed, could not really set and turning off seemed to be impossible. And it was a bit noisy during the night.Cleaning service was excellent and kind. Breakfast with wide variation of cakes and excellent fresh pastries was fine. Capuccino and omlet - extra charge - it's a pitty. Reception desk, check in, check out was smooth and proper. Parking is free (regular price could be from EUR 16/day in Milan) inside the undergound garage. Perosnally some spa and fitness opportunities were missing for me.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was an excellent choice everything was perfect, staff is courteous, the hotel is super clean. Breakfast is excellent. ‏the room was exceptionally clean and newly remodeled keep up the good work...
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: hotel is very well kept and seems to be a business hotel, room cleanliness is tip top and staffs were very helpful and professional. breakfast was also very good with varieties. hotel provides free basement parking. 5mins walk to closest tram station, you can conveniently purchase a one way ticket from reception. 3mins to a good nearby restaurant. I'm sure there is a supermarket nearby. surroundings are not busy with bustling crowds and felt safe. loved it because everything was within reach.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: good hotel outside the centre of Milan ( about 10 minutes by taxi from the centre ). Staff friendly and helpful, rooms good and well equipped ( TV signal not great ) comfy bed and good shower. Breakfast good selection although the "English Breakfast" was not great.Overall good hotel just outside the centre of Milan.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've never stayed anywhere without something that I wish was different or better until now. Price was reasonable, service was amazing, room was clean, well decorated, awesome shower, AMAZING WIFI!!!, great breakfast, and everything else I'm forgetting to mention.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is really goodStaff are prefect, friendly and cooperative Rooms are good and we'll designed Restaurant is good with very basic breakfastBut it is too far from the city center, almost 40min with busBut with a good access to bus stations and 2 big and good super markets
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is almost perfectly situated from my work here in Milan. The office is within easy walking distance, so I would not stay anywhere else. The rooms are great, large, comfortable, very clean and tidy. Bathroom good with all the facilities you could wish for. Staff are consistently good (this is not my first visit) and some very friendly and funny. Restaurant great for breakfast, but not so great in the evenings. If I was here on a holiday or with friends I would probably want to go out, but on my own, on a business trip, I just want some food in semi decent surroundings. Which you almost get.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is an ideal hotel for the business traveler although with the great service and information the staff provide the leisure traveler will quickly find his way around Milan with the public transport close at hand/within reach.We found the rooms quite spacious with tea and coffee facilities (not normal in Italy) and free wi fi.The food (breakfast) was good though language (English) still seems to be a problem in getting your eggs the way you like it.There is a lovely little restaurant across the street for dinner if you prefer but the Hotel's prices are very competitive.A great hotel with excellent service.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is quite new, the rooms are very big, and the bathroom also very spacious.It's far from the city centre, but well communicated (bus 50 and tramway 14)Breakfast correct, only tell the waiter to prepare a coffe at the bar, the machine in the breakfast is not very good
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room - ok: new, spacious, nice and clean. Breakfast - poor. Also not enough glasses/plates/cups provided, compared to a number of guests coming down for breakfast. So you can literally find yourself having no plate or a cup, and when you ask - they will bring you a plastic one!:)Location - far from centre but well communicated.Uber to the City Centre ~25eurTram no #64 takes you directly to the DuomoBus #50 takes you to Castello Storzesco and Metro
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 612, clean, nice, convenient, internet access ok, near the offices area, quiet area, good restaurant, good food, diversified breakfast, quality people, nice and careful employees...............in one word, nice
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Used this hotel for one night. Room is large and clean. TV is a modern flatscreen. Check in very friendly. Parking in the basement was included, :-). Bathroom new and clean as well. Did not have breakfast.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: it was a pleasant stay , the rooms were nice and clean , the reception staff very friendly , the breakfast was very poor , always need to ask for croissants because they were never on the table , the staff were rude , never say good morning or anything ....besides that it is a nice hotel !
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 2 nights. The rooms themselves are spotless, nicely furnished, clean and very modern. The building itself is quite ugly and old but the rooms are good and quiet. The breakfast is very basic and there are not real additional services. It is a good place to stay if you are on business or just getting through. The location is very far from the city centre.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our room was clean and spacious and the bed was huge. Parking and breakfast were free. There wasn't much going on in the neighborhood but it was easy to take a train/tram to central and it cost only 1.50e. We had nothing to complain about and would definitely recommend the hotel.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 2nights. The reception team were so courteous and very helpful. I called earlier about directions to the hotel from Linate airport and their suggestions about options helpful. The area is quiet. There's a MacD not far off. A shopping mall is about 1.5 - 2miles away. I liked my room. Spotlessly clean and comfy beds. Spacious rooms. Sweet smelling corridors. Very friendly staff from reception team to house keeping staff. Complimentary tea and coffee provided in rooms plus kettle. Ironing facility available on request. A very good ribs restaurant about a Km from the hotel.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Newly renovated hotel, some floors still in construction.Nice big rooms and bathrooms. Very clean. Comfortable beds. Quiet.Breakfast could offer a wider variety but OK.30 min. away from city center of Milan - could use tram or bus in front of the hotel (however tickets need to be bought in advance)
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed for 2 nights, the room was nice and clean, with a good view of the eastern part of Milan from the 7th floor. Breakfast has a good selection between sweets and non sweets food.The location is about 1 Km from the nearest underground station (Bisceglie), that can be reached by BUS. The BUS stop are in front of the Hotel, and reaching the city center takes about 30 minutes with public transport.All basic services are in the area of about 1km: a bank, some restaurant, market, small parks.The area is mainly a business/residential area, quiet in the evening.
hotelName:
17    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The place is beautiful and the staff there is very nice and friendly. The location of the hotel is perfect, since the Duomo is right across the street. There are also a lot of restaurant and stores around it.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good hotel, centrally located in the heart of Milan.Very good customer service and breakfast with good choice and variety of things. Bed confortable and good sleeting ensured . Highly recomendable.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s so good when you have to travel out but when it’s your birthday and you will. E alone is not funny. Here start the magic ‍♀️I was at NH hotel and it was my bday. I was at breakfast when the restaurant team came with cake, Prosecco and happy bday to you. It was so warm and delicate from them! 1000 times thank you. The hotel is fantastic, 600m from Duomo and Galleria Victorio Emanuelle. The restaurant is very good and the service is perfect. Thanks to all of you for the amazing days.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a great experience, right from check in. All the team were brilliant - very helpful and friendly, from the welcome team through to the team serving breakfast and those working in . Contacted the hotel beforehand on whatsapp (very convenient) to change my room details, they were quick to respond and deal with my query. Room was great, even the breakfast was good. Great variety of food, and fresh.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Although billed as a 5 star hotel, the amenities and high level of customer service are certainly lacking. No spa or fitness center. Waiters at the free breakfast are not friendly and give dirty looks. I know sometimes you pay for a higher tier room on Expedia and hotels don’t always honor the request but if I requested 2 beds, in a more than adequate space why would there be a treadmill there? Only good thing about this hotel is the proximity to the duomo and shopping center; take a look at other spots before booking this one
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have been staying in NH Collection Milano President for multiple times the past two months as I go there for business often. During my third stay in the hotel, I noticed that one of my dresses ( a $400 dress!) was missing but unfortunately I couldn't prove anything so I had to let the case go. To my great surprise, during my fourth stay in the hotel (I had to stay in the same hotel unfortunately since there was no other availability that specific week in Milan) another one of my dresses gone missing. I can now state for a fact that in the course of three weeks, two of my dresses "miraculously" went missing while in both cases I was staying at NH Collection Milano President. I contacted the management but they were not interested in my case and said: "we do not have any type of case to be reported". I spent the last 4 days of my stay with a "do not disturb" sign on the door because I felt unsafe and did not want more of my clothes to go missing. This is extremely frustrating and was terribly handled by the management who insinuated I might have forgotten it somewhere else (although I was staying in their hotel and although I have stayed in multiple hotels around the world as I travel a lot for business and I have never lost or misplaced anything previously)... Don't stay there if you want your stuff to be safe...
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 6 nights @ the hotel and as our first visit to Milan, we were very pleased with our experiences there. While my husband worked, the concierge was very helpful giving me directions to get about the city. Carmen, at the front desk, was always a pleasant source of information. Everyone was very helpful from the bartender to the housekeepers. We easily navigated through Milan with precision thanks to the staff @ NH. Our room was not huge, but we understand that in most (If not all) of Italy, that’s the norm. I definitely recommend staying there to visitors headed to Milan! Ciao!
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: one of the great nh hotel but location is great, breakfast buffet is awesome... The only disadvantage is hotel wasnt recognizable from the outside... entrance is not attractive.. inside needs renovation because looks very old. but in general worth to stay for short stays
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a terrific time at this hotel in Milan, our first trip there. Stayed with 3 other couples on an 18 trip to Italy. We had stayed at the NH collection hotel previously in Benice and were equally pleased. Breakfast was awesome and the location convenient to sightseeing & shopping!!
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed with my sisters at NH president for 2 nights, it was my first time staying at this hotel and my first impression was really not good, I faced unacceptable treatment that doesn't suite a 5 stars hotel at the reception while I check-in, but I would like to thank "Carmen" for fixing everything up with a smile and excellent and professional service, she did her best to make our stay much better and she provide us with extraordinary experience especially at checkout. If I will consider coming back to the hotel it will be only because "Carmen" treated us very well. Many thanks Carmen :)Moreover, I would like to thank "Sabra" and "Doha" from the breakfast.. extraordinary service with nice smile..
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed there for 3 nights and enjoyed the short walk to the Duomo, the metro, and shopping. The location is great. The room was wonderful, the breakfast was great, the check in was fast and friendly. We loved our stay. It is in a great location and just a short walk to everywhere. The staff was great in giving us recommendations for eating and shopping and sightseeing. Can't wait to go back.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice modern hotel, we found the location to be very convenient to the Duomo and center of Milan. All the staff, including the concierge, reception, restaurant staff and the girls at guest relations were particularly friendly and professional, with nothing being too much trouble. We booked the XL room as were there for 7 nights, plenty of space and very clean, would definately stay again and highly recommend this hotel to others others visiting Milan.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: clean room. nice coffee and decor throughout. the location is central to city and doumo.but there is road works in the middle of the road opposite the hotel. I did not hear any noise after hours. plenty of restaurants nearby. overall staff were helpful and efficient.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Highly recommend this hotel as a convenient location in the city centre. Only short 10min walk to the Duomo and close to lots of restaurants. The hotel is modern and clean with very comfortable room. My room was on the 6th floor with a balcony which was very nice. Large selection of pastries, cakes, fruit, etc for breakfast. Would definitely stay here again if visiting Milan.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the NH Collection Hotel President and liked it. NH Collection Hotels are a favored address. We had to change the arrival date for our prepaid stay by 2 days and the hotel management decided to increase the room rate due to the change. That was not appreciated and for Euro 300.00 per night the size of the room could have been more generous. The quality of the food in the restaurant is very satisfactory and so is the breakfast. The location of the hotel not far from the Domo is very convenient.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose this hotel because it was large and seemed to be part of an established brand (though we had never heard of the NH collection before in our travels.) We travel frequently (over 50 days per year) and intimately understand what to expect in terms of service at hotels. Sometimes we want a personable and boutique experience...or want to rough it or try something off the beaten path...but for this trip on this day, we just needed a safe place to rest our heads without much room for surprise.We really are not difficult customers, but this hotel was incredibly unaccommodating and rude to us. The room is fine, but the service was shocking. At this price point one can do much better we think and would just like to warn others before choosing this brand over others. The hotel is by no means a zero star place, but if you are picking between this and another established brand I would not choose NH.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wonderful Hotel with a swanky Bar and Restaurant. The staff were all very professional and couldn't be more helpful, in particular our waiter Alfonso was so friendly and had sound knowledge of the best wines to compliment our dinner plus nothing was too much trouble for him, we hope to see him again on our next visit to Milan.
hotelName:
18    NH Collection Milano President
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed our stay at the NH President Milano:1. Premium Room was large enough for 2 people with a small balcony.2. Bathroom was a bit on the small side but efficient.3. Room was immaculately cleaned daily.4. Bathtub fittings showed minor signs of lime deposits (which is always a turn-off).5. Nespresso machine was a plus.6. Reception staff nice but a bit aloof.7. The current construction site right in front of the hotel was a disappointment, although this is not at all the fault of the hotel.
