After checking out of the hotel (and flew to Spain already), I realized that I left my money pouch inside the safe of the room. I was very nervous and called NYX for help. Filippo answered my request with a great sense of calmness. With his help, they managed to find my money pouch (with everything still inside!!!). After a few phone calls and emails, he has found a reliable carrier to ship my money pouch back to me. I can't express how thankful I am of Filippo for not only finding my pouch, but also shipped it back to me. THANK YOU VERY MUCH!Without hesitation, I will definitely be recommending NYX Milano hotel to all my friends and relatives to come stay at this fantastic property. NYX is lucky to have such a wonderful and caring staff on their team. Thank you once again Mr Filippo!
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was put in a room over looking all the tram lines. This was not an issue, but the noise was. I heard the trams passing by the room every 5-7 minutes till about 2.30am in the morning! They were so loud you could hear them even with the TV on. Impossible to sleep. They start back at 5.30am...not sure how they can expect guests to stay in these rooms as there is no way you would get any sleep. I had to ask to be moved on the second night to another part of the hotel. I would not stay again unless I was guaranteed a quiet room.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed one night after arriving from Linate airport by bus to the central station. The location of this hotel is great. Next to the station and metro, taxis and trams.Check quick and efficient, rooms small but well equipped, functional and stylish (good sized bathroom and shower). Station facing room and had a nice balcony but at night, even with the window closed, you could hear the trams occasionally.Would stay here again
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in this funky hotel for only one night but can say service perfect, rooms immaculately clean and nicely decorated, breakfast was incredible. A lovely outdoor seating area to enjoy the summer weather. Wish I had stayed longer. Thank you to the staff You were so helpful and friendly.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good reception with porters assisting with luggage. A very short walk from the station although very bumpy over cobble stones. Reception was pleasant and professional. Certainly a different experience than what we had been used to. The refit of the hotel is modern although i am not sure about the floor tiles in the rooms. Breakfast was excellent with a wide variety of choices. Would be a perfect stop over in Summer with internal lounges and a grassed area.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s 3 minutes on foot from the bus stop if you take bus from Milan airport (bus fare €8). I stayed for 2 nights, but except sleeping and shower, I didn’t have time spent inside the hotel and so couldn’t say much, too busy going out. Room ok, bath room size ok but shower area is kind of small.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: we have stayed at nyx Milan last year for 2 nights on our way to venice and a cruise. We decided to stay in Milan to explore Milan and the surrounding areas. We arrivied late on Friday evening . we flew into Bergamo/orio airport and took the shuttle bus which was 7 euros each takes approx 50 mins to Centrale station which is just were nyx Milan is on the right with 2 gold statues (also there is a huge nyx sign above the hotel. We were checked in by the lovely Roberta i very cheekily told her we had stayed here before and would it be possible to have a free upgrade, she said yes . Well wow wow wow, we had room 432 it was a shock to us we had a junior suite. we had a huge room, sitting area, 2 tvs, dressing gowns, slippers, toiletries etc we felt so spoilt. The shower is amazing and there was plenty of soft towels. We didnt have the breakfast as we want to explore. if you do the breakfast is 10 euros each. This is an amazing hotel with very helpful staffand near the station and metro. You are able to explore Milan and all the surrounding areas. Rome is 3 hours away by train and venice is 2 1/2 hours away by train.Finally would i return to nyx Milan. Yes we definetly would come and stay at this hotel again
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is a good hotel with great connections with other parts of the city and even whole Italy. The rooms are not very big, but clean, breakfast is good, staff is friendly. All was good or very good, but not great. I have been in better 4* hotels. Next time I will check other hotels in the neighbourhood, but I may return to NYX.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice ,well equipped and comfortable rooms . Conveniently located a few tenths of meters from Stazione Centrale and Metro station . Very good breakfast. Proactive personnel . It represents a very good solution for business travels as well as for touristic visits of the town
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located across the road from main train station - 3 min walk. Great spot for overnight stay before continuing to travel by trains. We asked for quite room and got a nice suite that was away from nose of bars at the front. Hotel is very modern with high quality amenities. Very arty feel with modern sculptures and paintings. Room was clean and spacious, king size bed. Breakfast was good, large variety of hot and cold. Coffee machine was a bit busy early in the morning but manageable.Would definitely stay again.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Hotel deco is amazing, you even have free Arcade to play at the lobby..! The staff is really nice, even though we were early at Check in, they didn’t make us wait too long... Its location is excellent! The best because it is in front of the train station and you can get to any point at the city.. One tip, if you arrive at Milan Malpensa airport, do not take taxi (very expensive) Anyway... 5 star for location, decoration and very nice Staff!
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There are a few great things about this hotel but one bad point that all hotels must not make the mistake on. Let's start with the right elements. Firstly it is located just opposite the Milano Centrale station. Next, the decor and furnishings are modern and chic, feels like a fashionable boutique hotel. Lastly, check in was fast and the bell boy at the step area as well as the staff by the name of Max, hard working and cheerful fellow. Now on what shouldn't go wrong in any hotels, the front desk lady call Monica was aloof and serves with a bad attitude. No greetings, no smiles from her while doing our check in although I politely said good morning and thanked her. Prior to us, she was friendly towards some Italian/European couple but when it came to our turn, her attitude took a drastic turn. Which make me wonder is she being a racist? (we are an Asian couple). She needs to be properly educated on impartial hospitality. Else she might be better off in the kitchen where no guests would see her if she doesn't like serving people with diversity. Other than the little unhappiness upon check in, I'll say it's quite a pleasant stay but would I come back again? Probably not. Note: as there is a bar in the hotel, it can get noisy for guests staying on lower floors. Music was really loud. So not recommended to those with children or light sleepers.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We missed our train connection in Milan and were exhausted. We stumbled into the NYX hotel across from the main station.They spoke many languages and were most understanding of our situation. They gave us a great quiet room as we had a 630 am train the next day ,Restaurant service was super also Great value hotel- chic- but not over the top $$
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved hotel great location right next to train station as we were travelling on to Parma . Only stopped one night but enjoyed our stay . We loved the room s decor very arty we had room on 10 th floor had great view of station . Staff not over friendly but no problem really all went well never had breakfast thought bit expensive to be honest the guy on the door was very friendly helped carry our cases down steps when we left would recommend hotel great location .
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Love the vibe of the place! Love that it is so close to the Central Train station. Staff are friendly. Have to improve on their housekeeping, though. My friend found a leftover pizza which they didnt eat in their room; while our trash soap wrappers were not cleaned out.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent! Everything was near-perfect. Very nice, clean & comfortable room, free reliable WiFi & complimentary breakfast, and extremely courteous staff. The room amenities were just fine. Small suggestion: The glass shower door had no inside handle so could not close once in the shower (unless you are very tall and can reach the top) and the soap kept falling thru the wide soap caddy. Otherwise everything was great. All in all, we couldn’t be happier! We will return! NYX Hotel gets an A+
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Reviewed this Hotel from other travelers, came to Milan and stayed someplace else the 1st time, went and viewed it in person and after talking with people that leaving the hotel and based on their comments I booked it for my second trip to Milan. Only stayed one night, but they took me on early check in and had drinks and apps out in their garden area. Everyone was very friendly and helpful! Definitely recommend!!!
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All positive things to say about NYX Milano from the very beginning to the checkout. All the hotel staff and service members we came in contact with were very friendly, kind, courteous and helpful. We really appreciated the effort made by the front desk to check us in well before the normal check-in time. The breakfast and snack bar finger food were excellent.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is near the train station and a bit away from the major tourists destinations, but easy to get by metro or even walking distance. The hotel is nice and clean, the room was very spacious, but... the staff was very unfriendly and unprofessional. Their check-in time is 2 pm, but they couldn't check us in at 2:15 pm because the room wasn't ready, and they didn't even feel like apologizing for the wait (45 minutes). When I pointed at their check-in time, the answer was short - "FROM 2 pm!", which tells me it's a regular practice if they are so quick to answer. Our other questions were not answered so fast. When I asked about the laundry service I got 2 people telling me wrong information, and only the third staff person told us how the service actually work. We were satisfied with the hotel location, cleanliness, breakfast, but not the service of the front desk, which is the first impression you get at the door.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is exellent!! 1 min walk to the trian central station, big rooms, bar in the hotel. Amazing brekfest !!! good servies. We got presents in the rooms, chocolate and more... we had great time there. Will come back
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: standard room, no spacious, no small. everything are ok, breakfast standard in Italy. small lobby. you can found dingdong in the lobby area and photo box. the location near from train station and shopping, enough strategic.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An edgy design hotel just a minute’s walk from the Centrale FS station and metro. (From the airport it is 13 euros pp as opposed to 100 euro flat rate taxi). At check in we were greeted by Max and Anna and nothing was too much trouble. Room was very well appointed and we did not hear any noises from inside the hotel when in our room. I would imagine lower floors may hear road noise. Rooms serviced well. Arrival goodies and birthday treats were welcomed, Thankyou. Breakfast was a fine selection of breads, pastries, meats, cheeses, cereals, fruit and cooked items. Must give a special mention to Fabrizio and Ewa running the bar. Incredibly friendly and passionate about their cocktails. If you like Aperol, ask Fabrizio for a P31 Spritz - you won’t be disappointed. Pre-arrival communications were good too and I must thank Laura for this. Ohio the doorman always had a smile and a cheery word. Let the hotel order you a taxi - you receive a slip with the taxi number on and it arrives in seconds (Uber are more expensive in Milan). WiFi superb even in the room. Be sure to try the photo booth on the way to breakfast. However, one member of staff stood out as completely dedicated and nothing was ever too much trouble for him. He was eager to help and to make sure he understood and was Providing the correct information: Stefano - Thankyou for all your help, it was much appreciated. I have no hesitation in recommending this hotel and I would certainly return if in Milan again. I should imagine if it had a pool it would be 5 star.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel NYX was a good find, practically next door to the station so brilliant if you need a base to explore from. The staff were friendly, attentive and check in was smooth and swift. Rooms were functional, nothing special or memorable (apart from a game of 'hunt the light switch' in order to turn the many illuminations off for the evening) The bed was comfortable, the pillows on the flat side - we're not talking luxury by any stretch. Bathroom was clean but tired, and needed some attention as the rustic look wasn't intentional. I did find it amusing that there was no internal shower door handle so it was impossible to close it flush and avoid water spraying out onto the floor. The extra touches elsewhere overshadow these small niggles though - the free mini-buffet in the bar, the free photobooth and the hearty and plentiful breakfast. I'd definitely go back and would recommend you give it a try.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located across from the Centrale station with metro and tram links to all parts of the city within 5 minutes walk, rooms modern and staff very helpful nothing too much trouble. Rooms to rear with balconies looking over the city and snow topped mountain range - rooftop seating areas
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent a week at this 4*hotel. Superb. Food, ambience and the service from the reception staff was simply the best. Would definitely choose it for personal visit too. Rooms big and beautiful. Hospitality desk laid out water, fruit and sweets throughout the day for all to enjoy.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's a 4-star hotel just across train station. Surprisingly, it is not crowded at all.Pro's: Close to train station and metro station. The hotel has interesting design and pleasant open-air terraces on 4th and 5th floors. Rooms are not small, Internet speed is good. Tea pot is in the room.I didn't try their breakfasts, they look too expensive, and also you can buy all food and drinks in CONAD, in underground of train station. The food may be pre-heated there.Con's: No slippers in room. There is very short "late check-out", so if you need to check-out later then their time, you have to pay for full day and night.Generally, this hotel is a good point to reach all landmarks fast.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Warm welcome by the 'city lovers' at the front desk, lovely breakfast and great/ spacious room. Staff was helpful 24/7 and made our Milan trip extra memorable by providing great suggestions. We'll see you soon!
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I stayed in the NYX hotel for the weekend and we really enjoyed it. The hotel is located next to the central train station which gives an easy access to all types of transportation to the city center(few stops in the metro), airport and other cities and locations. The hotel has a unique design with different modern arts. It quite big with nice areas and Terrace. The rooms are well organized, very clean and has great view. We enjoyed the breakfast which had verities of dishes and drinks. We have found the hotel stuff very friendly and willing to help with everything we needed.We will definitely recommend it to our family and friends
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I traveled this month for the first time to Milan and I enjoyed so much.The staff excellent. They helped us and always with a good smile and very good service.The standart room for a single is ok... it was enough for me. So clean... So new... sparkling I can say...the view from my room was the best for me in Milan - ask for the good side of the view - to the center. I'm sure you can find more hotels in the main city but Nyx Milan is the center of the center.. it's 4 minutes walk to the Milan Centrale and in the street you have bus / tram and city train. you can feel the city.the lobby is perfect. every night the DJ on the stage. the staff at the bar very freindly. I like it and I will come back
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A gorgeous young hotel with fast checkin , wonderful clean rooms but a very poor service staff !! The checkin staff were nice and polite and we felt great when we checked in for 2nights !We were 3 adults in a Suite but only 1 complimentary water bottle a day !! When asked for it was charged at an exorbitant 4Euro/bott . One evening we decided to get food delivered to our hotel , when we asked for some cutlery from the Nyx staff - we were astonished that they wanted to charge for plates and spoons !!!The hotel is done beautifully , good breakfast , very good loaction but its the service that shall always be a scar in our memories !!
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 3 nights. The check-in was fast and welcoming. We were upgraded to a suite, the room was spacious clean and nicely decorated.The breakfast was exactly what you need, hot cappuccino, fresh breads eggs salad and more. We loved the pictures booth gimmick, it was really funny to start/end every day with a silly picture for the refrigerator. Location wise, most of the tourist attractions are not located next to the hotel BUT the train station and the metro station are 2 min walk. The train station is a central one easy to get to the airport and other cities in Italy. The metro station is also a central one so you can get to any part inside Milano in Just few minutes. For us the locations was perfect since we went also to a day trip to Venice. The “Corso Buenos Aires״ street is 15 min walk from the hotel so if you would like to combine shopping it is also very easy.Bottom line we loved it - I would definitely stay here again when coming back to Milano.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My 2 sisters and myself, enjoyed very much our stay in NYX hotel.The room was very big an clean.Breakfast was very testy.The hotel is 5 minutes from the central train station and the metro.Every attraction is very close to the hotel.The staff of the hotel was very friendly and service was excellant.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 3 nights on Christmas day for the Inter - Napoli match. When we reserved the room, we said it’ll be the 3 of us (2 adults & 1 child); and when we got to the hotel, not only we got a big room, there were also 3 of everything. Towels, mugs, slippers, bathrobes and the sofa bed already converted to bed. Love how the hotel make traveling feel so easy. The location is perfect, only 2 minutes walk from Centralle station. Easy to get around town as subway is there also. The art pieces throughout the hotel are amazing. And there are also few arcades in the lobby level where my son had fun playing during the 3 nights stay.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked this hotel for our final night in Milan and was not disappointed. The hotel is super modern and the decor is amazing. Our room was very clean and enormous. We didn't take advantage of the facilities but there was a roof terrace, garden and they even had a DJ on a Sunday night! The hotel is located right outside Milan train station and the hotel shuttle is a 2 minute walk away. Would definitely recommend this hotel!
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose this hotel because it was close to the train station, and it was a really good choice, it is perfect for travellers who travel by train! The rooms are very nice, modern and clean, also the bathroom!
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of all if you’re traveling to Milan via train, do yourself a favor and stay here. It’s literally a 3 min. Walk from Central train station. Pros~~LocationReception is very friendly, attentive, and ready to help. For November I thought the price was fair. Internet is fast and doesn’t randomly log you out. Breakfast is alright. Very modern and quirky design. We stayed on the 6th floor and it was relatively quiet. I liked that the bathroom had a regular door which is perfect if you’re staying here with a friend; you have some privacy. The hotel bar is really cozy, very creative cocktail choices- only caveat last call is at 2:00am on a Sat. Cons- - -It doesn’t have a practical entrance; you have to go upstairs to enter> not the best architectural concept since most people travel with luggage, or some may need special assistance.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My room was at 9th floor. It was quiet, very clean and comfortable. The location was perfect, near the central station of trains. Breakfast was good, bed was comfortable and bar has very nice cocktails. The room also had suficient amenities. I would recommend Nyx hotel Milan for sure.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We expected different and it was, from the moment we commenced our stay. A relaxed experience in a colourful environment where just outside are the streets of a busy city. Location was great as we were travelling by train and it is very close to Milano Centrale,easy walking distance. The room was amazing and everything we needed was provided. The NYX Hotel would have had an excellent rating but were seriously let down by housekeeping. There would need to be major improvements in housekeeping for this hotel to be one of the best hotels to visit. Staff were friendly and helpful during our visit. We also used the Hotel Restaurant for all three nights of our stay. It was so good, affordable, food and wine were of a high level and the waitress who served us on all three nights was excellent. The best we had during our travels. NYX Hotel is certainly the Hotel to stay at in Milan, but be aware that housekeeping may not be that good.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First they canceled my reservation because they messed up the payment, then they gave us the smallest room possible. The room was dirty upon arrival, stains on the cheets from blood and god knows what. The airconditioner was noicy and you could'nt change the temperture to below 23 degrees. Also the breakfast was expensive and bad. One good thing was the staff was helpful and friendly.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Something different as a hotel- art and modern. Very clean and quiet. On the opposite side of the Central Station (1 min walking distance). Very polite and helpful staff. Distance from Duomo around 5 km, approximately 15-20 min walking distance.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Unexpected design: hotel is full of artworks from local street artists, very tasty breakfasts, funny rooms (i had red light in bathroom), comfortable location - just across the main train station... all this made a very pleasant feeling during my stay. The only thing is missed was spa... nevertheless this hotel is highly recommended!
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is located right next to the main train station in Milan. It was very nice and our double room was exactly what we were expecting. Since we had planned to take day trips to Lake Como, this was perfect for us.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We toke the train into the Milano Central Train Station. All we needed to do is cross the street with our luggage and check in. The staff of course is very verse in English. The rooms are comfortable with everything you will need for your stay. Many great restuarants located around the neighborhood . Local transportation is convenient.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I arrived early and was given a room upgrade which was fabulous a huge room with excellent facilities.The breakfast was good although the very attentive staff kept whisking your food away before you were finsished.Would definitely return again
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: this was our first time to stay in Milan at nyx milan. We flew in to Malpensa airport and took the shuttle bus from the airport which cost 16 euros for 2 people and took about 50 mins. The shuttle goes to the Milan Centrale station which is opposite the hotel. Look to the right and there is a huge little sign saying NYX. There are a few steps to get into the hotel but luckily there are porters who will carry up your luggage for you. Checkin was super speedy. then we where able to get to our room. it was perfect, tea , coffee plenty of towels and complimentary toiletries. Wonderful shower. The american buffet was the best we have had i believe we paid 20 euros for the breakfast. The tram stop is right outside the hotel. Brilliant hotel to stay in central location. Excellent location for travelling around by train. we took the train to venice (italo treno) it took 2hrs 25mins to get to Venice .Thankyou for a wonderful stay in Milan
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Arrived here 2 hrs before check in having got off malpensa express. It's 200 yards from the train station, if that, and easy to find.Reception were very efficient and found us a room that was immediately available.The rooms are a good 4 star standard and feel freshly refurbished.Check out was equally efficient and the bellhop service was also good - we left luggage for the morning after checkout to see some more of Milan before onward travel.
hotelName:
23    NYX Hotel Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was at this hotel for 2 nights and had nothing but superb service. The staff were very friendly and welcoming. I did love the feature lights around the windows - made my stay worth while. I did have a slight hiccup which was the lights of my room stopped working from night 1 onward HOWEVER the staff were helpful and fixed it whilst we were out. Will be back to stay here soon. Would highly recommend it to others as is very close to central station and close to the Duomo and other sights.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We got an excellent stay at this hotel. The staff was really friendly and welcoming. Our room was really big, clean and modern.It is really close of the main train station. My only deception was that we wanted to eat something late (around 12:00 am) and nothing was available except the mini bar. Otherwise great stay!
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice stylish hotel just next to Milan's main train station. The hotel is great, prices are correct. The evening meal was well done and the service, impeccable. The buffet breakfast was varied but the quality wasn't that exceptional. Concerning the spa, it's a small nice one but the gym area is way to small tho. After that the staff is very helpful. One bad point was the cleanness of my bathroom which was really bad. The toilets were not cleaned.. Such a shame..
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed our stay. The room was clean and tidy. The staff were very helpful and friendly. The hotel is located near the train station which was handy. There are a number of nice coffee shops and restuarants close by.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place to stay with good connections, helpful staff and great response from the room service. Close to Centrale train and bus station so you can reach anywhere very easily. One of the better peaceful locations
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have stayed here before and loved the predictability. Very helpful staff, clean modern rooms and great location. We will continue to stay here for business trips to Milan. The subway is only a couple blocks away at MILANO Centrale.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for a week... ON 12th FLOOR Balcony Room. One of the best. View to die for. Corner balcony with glass walls. Large comfy king bed. Separate lounge room. Very large marble walk-in Shower with great pressure. Views to Milan from shower. TV in Bathroom. Power points where they should be. Very good air conditioning.Staff super friendly! Breakfast excellent and morning smiles and greetings every morning. BREAKFAST Staff there among the best we have seen. Young lady very impressive. Bar downstairs well appointed and quiet after long days of walking. CLOSE (300 metres) to Station Centrale into Duomo Milan (4 stops) and out to Como or even Switzerland.Reception is excellent - Counter staff couldn’t be kinder and more helpful.Really, this is a great hotel. Will be sorry to leave!Danmagpie
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a bad experience with the SIEMENS computer system managing our room and a positive experience with the service and management. The room climate control broke down at 3am in the morning, trying to cool down our room to 18C with tremendous noise. Lights and entrance card did not work any longer, however, the service was great, even at that early hour. Within 10min. the service guy appeared and fixed the problem together with his colleague at the reception desk (by remote control). Next morning the hotel took over our evening drinks in the rooftop bar as a compensation for the sleepless night - 5-stars for the service! Only breakfast quality did not match with our experience of a Hyatt hotel, some room for improvement still left after all.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stay at Hotel Hyatt is satisfactory. Staff is very cooperative .it is very ear to financial area and near to central . food courts are very near surrounding. most of the offices are near to this. very nice hotel
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was very supportive in some emergency and gave us full support i could not visit them but the way they supported i will visit them, special mention for federico in reservations good support from the team.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall, I’d recommend to stay here - it’s clean, modern, helpful staff and has comfy beds. When we arrived we had a large heavy luggage and there are only stairs to get into the hotel! No slope whatsoever to get the luggage up and no one to help us. We had to drag a heavy case up stairs to even get in. The entrance is also an entrance to other buildings so is in a very random place, it’s not very luxurious. When you enter the reception you can feel it’s not Hyatt quality. The decor and the darkness all look a little tacky/dated. The check in staff were lovely! Even printed one of my online tickets for me which I’m very grateful for. Breakfast was good, good amount of choice but slightly tasteless hot options. The room was very small! I couldn’t even open my suitcase anywhere - no where to keep and open the luggage. Couldn’t even open my case out on the floor because then you can’t walk. The blinds are super noisy and slow. Bathroom was clean and modern - no complaints there! There was a kettle too. The bed was comfy and everything was fairly clean. The corridor is so dark!!! Can barely see anything - slightly eerie. Lift is extremely slow! No help with bags unless you ask but the bellboy does not have a trolley so just manually picks them up and takes your cases down the stairs. The carpet and the tiles on the staircase are really poor design and a little tacky, completely takes away from the glamour a Hyatt should have. Turns out it’s only been a Hyatt from early May 2019. 8 min walk from the station which is easy to navigate but not easy with a large case. Close to tram stop too! Supermarket and shops available in the station for amenities. We enjoyed our stay but felt this hotel could up their standards a little to be a Hyatt.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Never consider staying in this hotel if you don't want your vacation to be ruined. The worst service ever, and it's a big shame for Hyatt. I have made a booking through their website and due to the technically issue on their website when making a booking for 1 night, my card was charged for 5 nights and they refused to refund the amount even though I called and sent emails explaining the situation!! I had the worst impression about Hyatt brand and Milan in general. Will never advise anyone to stay there!! Shame on Hyatt brand!
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After 3 years we came back to stay at this hotel again for a few days. This time we added breakfast, which we really enjoyed. It's a decent range of good quality food, fresh fruit and things like cappuccino can be ordered at no extra charge.The rooms are in the same style as on our first visit before the hotel rebranded to "Hyatt" – it's all modern and high quality. The room was very clean, although at one point a long hair fell out of the towels.Their information booklet in the room says you can borrow all sorts of things at the reception for the stay, including travel adapters and phone chargers, however when we asked for a USB phone charger, they didn't have any.Room service is a bit odd in this hotel. Although the room was made up nicely every day, sometimes they only took away the smaller towels without replacing them with new ones. We didn't even throw them on the floor. Either leave them where they are or replace them. There was only one spare role of toilet paper in the bathroom, but once we started using it, they never added another one for the rest of our stay, so it was not an oversight. I would expect a tiny bit more care in a hotel like this.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What’s not to love. The location is excellent. Like 5-7 minutes from the railway station. Great restaurants around. Friendly and helpful staff. Got an upgrade to a fairly spacious suite. If I had to say something negative, it would be that the lifts were damn slow. So much so that we chose to walk up and down to the first floor with our baby’s stroller rather than wait for the elevator. Still , overall a great stay and highly recommended.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When we booked the hotel, it was part of Sofitel, now it's part of Hyatt. The hotel is a 5' walk from Central Station, and you can get there using one of the many shuttles (EUR 8) from the airport. It is also 2 blocks from the Lanza subway (M2) and a 5' to Central Station subway (M3) and many buses and trams.The room was big, with a nice updated bathroom, with the usual room amenities (refrigerator, toiletries, coffee and tea, water, space for luggage, flat screen TV, etc.). There was a comfortable sofa chair, a chair with wheels (likely to use it for work) and an ottoman. The wi-fi, hot water, AC were good. The room was somewhat dark and the choice of dark colors for furniture, closets, decorations, etc. doesn't help either. There are a lot of buttons by your nightstand to control the lights and the curtains; which took time to learn (I hit the button to turn-off the light and the curtains went up). The desk is very much occupied by lamps, coffee and tea making tray, etc. Not a desk to work comfortably.There is a gym room, with a bike, a treadmill and an elliptical machine. some free weights. Decent. Big Service issue: The bathroom started to have a (sewer) smell after 3 days, we reported this immediately. We were told it was a pipe problem that supposedly, was fixed two days after reported. However, the smell came back the next day. The solution of the problem on day 6? The windows were open! Also, a staff member offered on day 4 to spray to improve the smell. We should have been offered to change the room, something that never happened. Small service issues: We had to ask for more hangers, since there were only 5 in room (usually, there are more, especially if the the hotel knows it's a long stay). After day 5, the toiletries were not fully restocked, same for complimentary water (we had to ask for it).Breakfast was fine, with a good selection, but the selection is always the same. I stayed for 5 days and wife for 8 days, after 3-4 days, you get tired of eating the same. If you want a cappuccino or a latte you have to ask a member of the staff members working the room. By the way, the never asked us if we wanted something during breakfast. We learned we could order an espresso when we saw somebody ordering one. Strange, but it reflects a lack of service.Overall, for a 4 star hotel, there were too many issues, mainly related to poor or lack of service. In addition, the pipe problem, was never fully resolved. A big no-no..
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in a great location, about 5 minutes from central station. There is a rumble every now and then from the tram line outside but the beds are comfortable. The staff were professional and did what they're there to do but it seemed to be lacking a bit of personality. No room service and fairly average tea and coffee making facilities. It just felt like the right boxes has been ticked to get the four star rating, but it didn't feel like a 4 star. Would stay again if on business but if you're looking for something better than a holiday Inn for a family trip you'll probably be a little underwhelmed.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in a good location for getting about the city and the surrounding area. It hasn't been a Hyatt long. When we booked it was the MGallery but not sure there have been many changes yet. Interior of the hotel is very dark. Rooftop bar was good and breakfasts were OK. Beds were very uncomfortable.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: During my stay, the hotel was just changing brands, from LaGare Milano Centrale to Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale. Both "periods" of my stay were just excellent. The hotel is within a 7 minutes walk from central railway station, where you can also find two metro lines. The rooms are clean and quite cosy. Breakfast is delicious. All the staff is very nice and helpful - special thanks to Alessandro for the time he took to find for me a cinema that would show Avengers: Endgame in Original Version. ;)
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I just returned from a 3 night stay at the Hyatt Centric. It was located very close to the Milan Central train/metro system. Yes, a five minute walk to the hotel ! Some friends informed me that there was a grocery store in the lower level of the train station...if one wants some bottled water or snacks...Other than that, there is not one shop around the hotel for such things. The staff was helpful and accommodating as I became familiar with the many switches in the room. Yes, the hallways are dark...the neon room numbers are cool though.I stayed in a junior spa suit. The room had three floor to ceiling windows. The room was large and very bright and felt wonderful to walk into after a busy day. So, the dark hallways did not bother me. The elevators were never an issue for me either. Breakfast was all encompassing and there wouldn’t be one thing that one would desire...It had everything...plus efficient staff and a nice large, bright room...excellent..I did eat in the restaurant in the evening and it was adequate.I am really picky about my hotels and this was an excellent stay for me..I would highly recommended and return !
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I use the Hyatt brand whenever I can so we used this one in Milan. It looks nice from the outside and the lobby was nice as you can expect from Hyatt. Then the room as we walked in we turned the lights on they didn’t work so we called reception they sent someone to fix it and we went out for a bit, when we returned to our room later on we wanted to see and use the spa at the cost of €15 per person per use we paid a lot of money for the room you would of thought it would of been free for guests. We left the aircon on the coldest setting until we returned to our room when we got back it was boiling and blowing out hot air so hot in fact we had to stay in the hallway for cool air again had to get it fixed. At check out we told the lady about our problems and she refunded us our mini bar and spa usage even so I think with the money the room cost plus the service you expect from the Hyatt chain these problems should happen in the first place.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was a nice hotel to stay in. Very clean, central, near the Central Station. The room wasn't huge but as I was on my own that wasn't an issue. Nice people at the reception desk and very helpful when I wanted to book restaurants. The bar was open late, which was good ! I would stay there again for sure.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel itself is nice and the room has been spacious but from a technical perspective the setup is too complicated given that the building is rather new. There are around 10 buttons to serve the light (even with a printed menu on what each button does). Also for the remote control, the TV usage wasn‘t intuitively (therefore another instruction was printed to explain it to the guests). There are around 200 Italian channels but only around 5 international news channels in English language. Not really good enough for an international hotel chain. Given that we have reached the digital age, it would be not too much of an ask to support at least HDMI access or a smart TV to overcome this problem
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Recently spent 3 nights at this hotel. Very close easy walk even with luggage from train station if you arrive in Milan by train. Hotel is modern, clean and comfortable making it a nice stay. A little further out from the centre of town but it depends on what you are doing with your days. A special shout out to Annalisa at breakfast service this lovely lady went out of her way to make our breakfast special Bringing us a special treat. Really surprised us and was an unexpected treat which made out morning. So big thank you to her. Would recommend if using trains to get around especially.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked through “Prestigia” and in order to get the price a room has to be selected, I was comparing between two rooms and I proceeded without unselecting the other room. By mistake I booked two non refundable rooms. I asked the agent to cancel one only but the hotel refused. What will I do with two rooms its useless. Its not a big deal I don’t understand why they refused. A mistake can happen, and the management are there to help and support. I wish my request reaches the top management as i believe they will definitely help. Thanks.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: New hotel . Really nice and pleasant.. kind of boutique hotel . Nice rooms , big , a shower you want to stay all day ...centrally located... great breakfast with a grand selection.definitely I am coming back .....
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: In short, better to spend €40 more and stay at next door Hilton or Sheraton. I chose this hotel because of SOFITEL Accor membership but understood it was a big mistake the moment I entered the hotel and saw the ground floor rooms like dark prison cell they offered me. It has nothing to relate to first class Accor hospitality nor Sofitel service. After such disappointment I regretfully booked at another hotel despite prepaid room at the Lagare hotel. It is normal that staff at most centrally located hotels are spoiled in Europe but at least show some sign of positive approach.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Despite the central downtown location within walking distance, this hotel still provides privacy & amenities that smaller hotels in the area cannot. All the staff were genuinely helpful, caring & welcoming. The modern rooms are about the right size & feature all the amenities/conveniences. We slept soundly thanks to good sound insulation. The buffet breakfast was generous.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent city location a short walk from the Central Train Station, yet still offering privacy & great noise insulation. Very modern, clean & comfortable rooms & a comprehensive buffet breakfast. Five stars from me!
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My impression of the hotel: Slightly rude service, nothing works and everything costs extra.Lighting, curtains and the disco-esque color-changing LED-light in the window were controlled by a panel in the room, which was clearly of Italian design. 16 buttons, and no indication of what would happen when pushing each of the buttons. Extremely frustrating! I also do not understand why I would want to adjust the toilet lighting from the bedside?The electronic curtains were very loud when being lowered/raised. I could hear when my next door neighbors woke up due to the noise of their curtains being lifted.I asked for an iron for my shirt, but they had none. I could have my shirt ironed by their service during some specific hours... for an extra charge obviously. If you make up rules of an iron being not allowed in the room, you should at least provide one in a common ironing room etc.The hotel building is very tall, but there are only 2 "Italian style" extremely slow elevators. Every trip to the lobby took 3-4 minutes due to this.Breakfast was mediocre at best. Everything looked like it had been on the table for a bit too long. Regardless of paying for a breakfast during booking, an omelette from the kitchen cost 8€ extra. This seems weird considering the price range.The hotel had a spa, which as I understand consisted of a sauna and lounge chairs. The price was not included in the hotel stay, and was around 16 €. Seems like a total ripoff.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very kind and polite reception desk, welcoming rooms, good location (close to the central station and the subway), wide and well-kept breakfast. BUT they do not take care some important details: in case of allergies, the hotel is not able to guarantee rooms without previous animals stay. This is an essential condition in a luxury hotel and if lacking may cause serious inconvenience in the room and resting problems. I'd like to come back for all the rest, but I cannot .
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I'm frequent traveller and Accor addicted since years, so I always choose Accor hotels around the world. Normally I rate 5 stars for every Sofitel and/or McGallery structure, but for LaGare in Milan was not the case. When I made the reservation I asked for an early check-in and I didn't get; I also asked for a Nespresso machine in the room and I didn't get. I would have expected to know that upfront (maybe by email or call) instead of realizing when I arrived. Last, should be great if breakfast started at least at 6.30 am instead of 7am or - at least - having a bar available for espresso 24hrs.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is close to Central Station, and you can get there from Malpensa airport by the train service (which is often unreliable, sadly). It is also close to subway station.When you arrive, a huge stair is waiting for you in front of the hotel. They have someone to help you with bags, but if there are a lot of people upstairs and down, you would have to wait for a while for your turn.The biggest problem here are the elevators, as they have huge number of rooms and only two elevators. You would wait for ages on the morning before elevator will arrive, a huge planning oversights.Breakfast is nice, but selection stays the same, and it is rather modest. I stayed for 5 nights and I could not see those same dishes anymore. They also reuse yesterday's pastry, which is an embarrassment for a 4-star hotel. Breakfast room is very small and it is packed with tables, very hard to walk around without a risk of bumping into somebody. And it is unpleasant to eat here with people constantly hovering over you.Also, they do not provide irons to the rooms, you have to use their service, and I did not see anything like this in my entire travel experience.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just stayed here for 1 night. Beautiful room and breakfast was delicious. About 10 minutes walk to Milano Centrale train station and within walking distance for a lot of eating place. Very pleasant experience.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very conveniently located, less than five minutes walk from Milano Centrale railway station and close to several metro lines, allowing you to access the hotel and the city with ease. From the outside the hotel is very striking at night. Inside it is very comfortable and well designed. Rooms are large and very pleasant. The spa is well worth a visit and very relaxing. We were a bit surprised at the bar prices, €26 for two spirits and two mixers, however, the measures for spirits were very generous. We spent five nights at the hotel and would definitely return.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at LaGare for two nights and it was as great of an experience as it had been in 2017. The rooms are very stylish and comfortable, as well as providing an ideal location with a 10-minute walk to Centrale. I have already made my reservations for 2019.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here twice on a tour in October. Our first room was a handicapped room so we moved to a regular room the second day. Returning to Milan we were again placed In a handicapped room. The handicapped bathrooms were large with showers with a curtain only. No water on the floor after but no place at all in either bathroom to put anything as no counters or shelves. The regular room was on the tenth floor with a great view. Too many wall switches so very confusing to turn out lights. Great storage, A/C was quiet, comfortable beds. Two blocks from central train station and a few restaurants, and banks nearby. Great food.Rooftop bar has great view butis busy with young locals on weekends.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed four nights at La Gare and we loved every minute of it. It’s a modern hotel with beautiful décor (from the reception area to the hallways to the stairwell to the rooms themselves), friendly and helpful front desk, spacious quiet comfortable well-equipped rooms, excellent breakfast buffet, great in-house restaurant La Gare Bistrot, and easy access to the Milan’s main train station and metro lines. At night, the facades of the hotel are brilliantly illuminated with ever-changing colored lights. The effect this had upon entering the hotel and from inside our room was mesmerizing. We highly recommend the hotel and we would gladly stay here again. 5 stars across the board. Helpful hint: the nearby restaurant Osteria Italiana Milano on Via Napo Torriani was fantastic. It was so good we ate there twice.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can only be positive about this hotel as a bed and breakfast establishment - -see below - it will be scored as such.The room was spacious, with a large bathroom and comfortable bed - room 704 was nice and quiet.Breakfast was good, although the coffee was not great and the chef needs to learn how to make scrambled eggs! Waiting staff were impeccable.I was on a business group booking so the menu for the evening meal was limited - should not have been a problem. First evening. Ravioli pretty al dente but filling was nice. Turbot was overcooked to jelly - what a crime!Second evening. Pasta so al dente it was barely cooked - inedible. Pork fillet served with a bloody, raw centre - a risk to health and not touched. No offer of any alternatives. Went to bed hungry.Reception staff excellent. It transpired that the kitchen was a different company. The manager did not take up an offer to meet with me. Not good enough and damaging to an otherwise good operation.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 3 nights at this hotel which is seems to be located in the financial district of Milan. Nevertheless, the hotel is in an ideal location, only a short 10 minute walk from Milano Centrale train station which is great if you plan to spend a lot of time exploring main city centre of Milan (Duomo, Galleria Vittorio etc). Trains to Lake Como also depart from this station. Hotel itself is stylish and typically designed to accommodate guests on business trips. Reception staff were all very friendly and welcoming. However, do not get your hopes up for an early check-in time, we experienced a lot of people waiting around the main lobby area (including us) right up until the 2pm check-in time. We found the rooms to be extremely dark and a real challenge to get ready in the morning! Housekeeping was also very hit and miss over our 3 night stay. We found our towels and tea bags had not been replaced as well as items being put away in places where we could not find them. Also the shower handle broke mid-way through taking a shower. The rooftop terrace was very buzzing and a nice addition to the hotel.The location and proximity to the city centre, Linate airport & Como made up for these few faults.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The greatest thing about this hotel is that it is at a walking distance from Milano Centrale. If you plan to be getting into Milan or head somewhere from Milan by train, this hotel is a great option.Good size rooms with a decent sized bathroom. This is important when traveling in Europe, as accommodations are normally not as good sized as they are in the United States. The room at LaGare was comfortable.Upon getting in at night we went up to their rooftop, which is incredibly nice for an evening/night drink. The service up there was amazing. We were here for the Formula 1 weekend and it was quite convenient to head to Monza from the hotel.They have a nice cozy lobby with a small restaurant which has a very nice outside terrace. One day coming back from the F1 practices we sat there to drink some wine and it was quite pleasant.The staff was incredibly helpful and kind during our entire visit! We've been back to Milan and decided to stay at LaGare again. Not giving it an excellent overall rating as for me that is reserved for places that truly awe me.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Contemporary in design, the LaGare Hotel Milano was a pleasant hotel for our one night stay in Milan. The rooms were small compared to U.S. standards, but offered the same ameneties for travelers. Two drawbacks were the darkly dimmed hallways and the numerous steps to the hotel entrance. If you have a physical disability, climbing those steps with or without baggage will be a true challenge.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is a 5 min walk to Milan's Central train station along with its metro system. We selected this hotel for this reason as we were taking the train for day trips to Verona and Bologna. Several restaurant choices are within walking distance. Rooms were very small and dim lighted. Throughout the hotel lighting was dim and very dark environment. The breakfast buffet was average. Complimentary water was given only on the 1st night which seems a bit cheap for the price of a room.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed our stay at the LaGare quite a lot. Friendly staff, clean and nice decoration all over. Breakfast with many choices and good times. Rooms a bit small and the aircondition was totally unnerving ( impossible to stop even for engineers ) but a good bed and bathroom.The drinks at both bars were good but with almost ridiculous costs. 10€ for a tiny beer. Rooftop terrace with good view and nice setup but really too expensive. Seemed to be a blogger and influencers hotspot - very funny !
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It looks trendy but this hotel falls down on so many levels. Firstly access, there’s hardly any space to have your taxi stop outside, the driveway is also the access to a large car park. Then there is a flight of stairs up to reception and no one to help you with the baggage. Secondly, the lifts are a joke. One was out of order and the other is so slow, you might wait 10mins just for the lift to arrive already full of members of the public trying to get up or down from the rooftop bar. The rooms are small and the internet didn’t work.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I were passing through Milan for our annual vacation and needed a nice hotel that was near the train station. We chose LaGare and loved it! It’s walking distance from the train station and it’s really comfortable. The staff is also very accommodating! I highly recommend this hotel if you are seeking a nice quiet stay with quick access to the train and restaurants. The Wades
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is modern and vibrant but in a quiet part of the city but superbly located 5 minutes from the central station.The rooms are modern, spacious and very comfortable. So quiet. The bathroom had an amazing shower that was very hot.The facilities include 2 bars one of which is a great roof top bar over looking the city.The breakfast buffet was also very good.There is a gym and wellness suite including sauna, steam room and jacuzzi. The staff are very polite and professional and everyone spoke amazing English.A very satisfying stay all round!Highly recommended.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a very nice stay at this hotel The rooms and hotel decoration is very unique and modern The breakfast is various and tastyThe location is close to central train station but a bit far from the old downtown.The staff were very professionalThey had no iron policy in rooms which is a bit awkward Very good choice in Milan
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Chose it because of proximity to central train station, but was pleasantly surprised! Rooms a bit small but immaculately renovated. Restaurant staff were overwhelmed during breakfast, as there were too few of them for the full-house rush. But that aside, a pearl with good value for money if you don’t care to be so close to the shopping/Duomo district.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband & I stayed at the property for 4 nightsWhilst the room was in good condition & bathroom, clean. It was quite small for our both our luggage We looked forward to going for swim in the pool only to find out it cost 15 euro as it had spa services included. I couldn’t take a look at it before paying, so decided to pass.I needed an iron for my clothes and was told there are no irons in the room. They charge 6 euro to iron one piece of clothing on the dry cleaning price list??? I’ve never seen this anywhere in my travels all over the world until now. There’s is no hair dryer either. For Sofitel I thought this would be included.Location wise close to central station which is handy. But on the upside besides cleanliness of the rooms the staff were quite welcoming & friendly. Overall besides the couple of negatives it was a nice hotel
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I picked this hotel because of its location very close to the Milano Centrale train station and because it was an MGallery hotel, so I thought there would be something special about the property. But it’s actually a very ordinary hotel. The rooms are very small. The pool or spa that you see pictures of is an additional charge of 15 euros to use for two hours. It’s either recently built or newly refurbished as the decor of the room was quite nice, but otherwise I don’t think there is anything special about this hotel.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent 3 days in that hotel, really nice design, really really nice big room with king size bed. The rooftop is really nice so is the view on Bosco Verticale. The location is good as it's close from the Milano Centrale station, you can walk the city or take the subway. The breakfast is amazing The bed is great The lift are slow, as expected after reading the other reviews, before booking, yes the lift are a bit slow...but we are in holidays :)I didnt like the fact that bottle of waters are not replaced everyday. also that the pool is displayed as part of the hotel when actually it's within the hotel spa with 15 euro fees to get in from 5:30pm to 11:30pm, in a city that warm in summer, the pool was actually the + that make me book the hotel. Staff is pro and nice. Fun lighting at night.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s the perfect city hotel I believe in Milan. 5 min walk from Central station to get underground to downtown and trains if you want to do any day trips to near cities. 10 mins from Duomo with a taxi (10-12€). I give the 4 stars because of the average housekeeping of the hotel.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent in Hotel LaGare one night in Wellness Junior Suite with private hammam. The entrance hall was very nice and modern, personal at reception was very kind and they explained us everything we needed. We get a room at 8th floor. The halls are a little bit darker but I like the atmosphere. in the bathroom were welcome packs with toiletries. The room was very clean and view was perfect. The breakfast was also very delicious but the dinning room was a little bit too small in my opinion. We also tried spa for 15 euros per person / 2 hours and it was worth the money. In the spa you have free detox drinks, mineral water, teas and much more. The Wellness Area features a scenic Roman bath with jacuzzi and water games, where you can relax and enjoy a atmosphere thanks to the starry vault, sauna, Turkish bath, salt cave, sensory showers. We really enjoyed it there and we will definitely come back.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed her strictly for business (why else would one want to stay near the station). Was not overly impressed, but what upset me the most was that the staff lied about their reason for a lack of an iron in the room and their inability to provide me with one. I was told that Italian law dictated that it was not possible. I previously lived in Italy for 2 years, have stayed in numerous hotels across the peninsula, and this was the first time I learned about this "law". The following week, I stayed in Venice for a conference and there my hotel provided me with this basic feature upon my request, without issue. If the hotel does not trust their guests to use an iron, that is one thing, but they should not use Italian bureaucracy as a scapegoat... Because of this, and do to their lack of cares given, I would not recommend staying at this venue for work-related functions.
hotelName:
24    Hyatt Centric Milan Centrale
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the only hotel I stayed each time I went to Milan. All the wonderful people at front desk, restaurant, concierge, bell desk are so nice they always make me feel at home. Anyway had an unpleasant experience at check-in one night early July. The girl at front desk received me was cold and bothered, the communications was mean as if she was talking to an inferior, it just made me feel to go to another place for good. Fortunately in next a couple of days,I was glad to see that kindness back again, from some familiar faces and lot of new faces. Front desk is the window of the hotel, don't put any reluctant face in this important position to stain the prestigious name.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a truly outstanding hotel. Everything is nice. The rooms are comfortable and the service is outstanding. I enjoyed my stay here. This is a great hotel option if you are planning to be in Milan.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a five star hotel in every sense. The setting, staff, rooms and food are all top notch. The rooms were decorated nicely, the wood word was exquisite and the house keeping staff serviced the rooms several times during the day. The spa was top notch with services, a pool, sauna, steam room and gym. The views from the top floor of the hotel were spectacular. Milan is a great city and if I returned, I would definitely stay at the Savoia.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Hotel Principe Di Savoia is a truly outstanding hotel.Fantastic service, fabulous rooms, wonderful attention to detail. The breakfast is wonderful, Our dinner at the restaurant was perfect.The hotel also offers a shuttle service all throughout the day to the shopping area and the Duomo.Lots of little extras. Great attention to service and detail which contributed to wonderful time during our stay in Milan. I would absolutely recommend this hotel - it is superb.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fabulous location offers easy level walk to all the 'must do's'.Lobby flowers were gorgeous. Lobby bar was inviting and the service perfect.Unfortunately, I was unable to avail myself of all the hotel had to offer as I was feeling unwell on arrival for a 3 night stay. The Spa, Pool and gym all LOOKED great.Concierges were wonderful in organising doctor's visit, picking up medication and helping me in many ways. House keeping and room service were kind and efficient.My room on the sixth floor was beautifully decorated, huge bathroom and yummy mini bar. Quiet.I had breakfast in the hotel..huge choice, excellent coffee and delicious food. I was too ill for the Michelin restaurant and too ill except to have room service.My stay was extended by a further two nights due to illness. Nothing was too much trouble.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was our second visit to the Hotel Principe di Savoia, conveniently located at the Piazza della Repubblica. It is about a 30 minute walk to the central area of Milan where you'll find the shopping district, the Duomo and the famous Galleria Emanuele "shopping mall" which is actually an enclosed facility loaded with shops and restaurants. The hotel itself is absolutely top notch, a feeling you get as soon as you walk through the front door where you're greeted by the reception staff. The check-in process is a breeze. The rooms are large by European standards, even the Classic Room. Free wifi, room safe, full complement of bathroom amenities and a large HD-TV. Beyond the room itself, a very courteous and helpful concierge staff. A formal restaurant is available in a separate room near the reception with a "lighter fare" area immediately off the reception area for those who want a simpler option. This hotel is excellent in every respect...the value is definitely commensurate with the room rates. Highly recommended by us...
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Every detail in this hotel was so intricately designed. From the minute you pull up in your car, you know this is luxury. The rooms are very comfortable and equally beautiful as the lobby. I highly recommend this hotel!
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is one of the best Hotels in Milan. I find myself almost repeating my exemplary review from last year, the difference was that this year the staff remembered all the special details I required a whole year ago...…….how do they do that? It is quite a large property and they must have so many guest requests since my last, but after a year all the staff still made me feel individual with attentive service whilst always being charming, polite and very efficient at all times and everywhere in the hotel, whilst never being intrusive. The concierge particularly approachable and helpful. The common areas are all beautifully appointed, and the rooms 5* luxurious.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: No doubt this hotel could use an upgrade interior wise - but service, quality in all details, guest experience and comfort are second to none. You are feeling the Dorchester DNA everywhere in the house.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the only hotel I will ever stay in when I am in Milan! The hotel is beautiful and the staff are amazing. I found the service to be outstanding and very friendly. It is also perfectly located to see all the best places in the city. Can’t wait to return.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have never paid so much for a room and been treated like garbage. Stasi style team at check in were relentless in ensuring the check in was as unpleasant as possible. The bed configuration was not as requested, they were unapologetic. They insisted that a French ID for friend at check in was insufficient, passport was needed. It took the car park chap 30 mins to retrieve the car to retrieve passport for check-in. No humanity at check in
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is a lovely hotel and has a true elegance. The restaurant is quite good . The rooms facing the front are large and quite comfortable. It is a little outside of the center but a shuttle van goes often and makes the center quite accessible . The hotel is a good valve and quite well run .
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 9 March - 08:00 PM o'clock.The waitress provided a non- professional service at the bar. An invasive person! Please undertake the necessary measures regarding the conduct of this unpleasant waitress!
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: So long as you reserve at a minimum the deluxe room the rooms are well sized and well kept. The service is solicitous and there is a shuttle to the shopping area. Walking is about 15 minutes so not far at all. It is a dependable hotel for shopping and business in Milan.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I arrived at midnight 4-5 march (805 room) in and checking in my room during 20 min, because hotel’s credit card terminal didn’t work. I felt sleep, I didn’t remember so long check in so high class hotels. I upset.I think you can find better hotels in Milan.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed at many 5 star hotels. But when I opened my door to my room, I was blown away. The presentation was out of this world. The bed was firm, but once you put your head on the pillow you are out for hours. The staff are super friendly and help you in anyway they can. The lobby and the whole.hotel is laveshed with beautiful ornaments. The rooms have lovely paintings. Very well located and would.love to come back.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was and still is one of the kind going through the years with an amazing class and style.Bkfst if very good, room comfort un-discussable, even if old style, it has its charm and warmth. Service is at the overall high standard image. Room price is not the most expensive in Milano. If you go by car, check first their parking fees ...
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a few nights while on business. Excellent Dorchester collection hotel. Having stayed at other properties, I was looking forward to it and this was as expected. Luxurious, beautiful building and lobby, rooms were comfortable and we were upgraded so quite a large room with high ceilings. Traditional beautiful furnishing appropriate for the style. Staff were friendly, attentive and most importantly efficient. They were quick and happy to accommodate any requests. I used room service a lot and appreciate their efforts in customizing my orders. My guest arrived earlier before I did and before check in time...the reception staff were very accommodating in allowing him to check in ahead and asked for his room preference, which was greatly appreciated.Overall a wonderful hotel in a great location with friendly staff. If I had to make one criticism it would be some wear and tear is evident in the rooms and hotel is probably in need of refurbishment in a few years time. However it didn’t detract from our stay and would highly recommend!
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location and Competent service. Staff were polite and helpful, most spoke English.We had no meals other than breakfast but this was good and served in a lovely garden setting. I think the decor although not at all shabby does need an update. Our room was smaller than we had hoped for but clean and the linen was of a high standard.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I spent 4 nights at this grand hotel. Our premium room very very spacious, tastefully renovated with a luxurious bathroom. The staff are very attentive, especially the person at reception. He escorted us to the restaurant b/c our room was not ready, then came to let us know when the room was available.The location of the hotel turned out to be very ideal. It is away from the commercial center of the Duomo and the shops. But only a 15 minutes maximum ride by taxi to almost everywhere. We walked to Eataly which was 15 minutes. We are also a short distance to the central train station. We can’t wait to return to Milan and will definitely be returning to the “5” star hotel!
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is extremely beautiful and well take care, the room are very nice and big very victorian style..I love it....the problem was just the price ...over 450€ per night...I have been In hotel as good as this one for 180/220€ a night
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stunning hotel, in easy walking distance of both the old town and new town. Rooms are well appointed and comfortable. Staff are friendly and helpful. Excellent gym facilities. Would happily stay here again.
hotelName:
25    Hotel Principe Di Savoia
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Love, love, loved this hotel. Aside from the gorgeous room that we were upgraded to due to our American Express Platinum Card, and the lovely location and free shuttle to the touristic part of Milan, the staff are in large part why I am writing this review. When we first arrived it was early, and, having been to Europe at least 30 times, we are used to the fact that the room will not be ready. This is the first time, however, that we were told they would try to make the room ready for us asap and they actually did it!!!
